HANGOVER IV: Hydration & Recovery
Ingredients:
Normal Saline 0.9% IV fluid, Electrolytes, B-complex (B1, B2, B3, B5, B6), Hydroxocobalamin (B-12), Magnesium, Pepcid (option), Zofran (option), Toradol (option), Sodium Bicarbonate (option), Glutathione push (recommended)
Key Ingredients and their Benefits in our Infusion:
B-Complex Vitamins-
These vitamins are crucial for energy metabolism and help reduce fatigue and irritability, improving your overall mood and cognitive function.
Vitamin B-12-
Hydroxocobalamin supports red blood cell production and energy levels, aiding in mental clarity and combating the sluggishness often felt during a hangover.
Magnesium Chloride-
Magnesium helps alleviate headaches and muscle tension, common hangover symptoms. It also aids in rehydration and restores electrolyte balance.
Pepcid (option)-
This medication can help reduce stomach discomfort and nausea by blocking acid production, making it easier to settle your stomach after drinking.
Zofran (option)-
Zofran is effective in preventing nausea and vomiting, providing relief from gastrointestinal distress often associated with hangovers.
Toradol (option)-
An anti-inflammatory medication, Toradol helps reduce pain and discomfort, providing quick relief from headaches and body aches.
Glutathione (Push Recommended)
As a potent antioxidant, glutathione aids in detoxifying the liver and clearing out toxins from alcohol consumption. It significantly enhances recovery speed and overall well-being.
    Want to go all Natural? Substitute all medications and replace with sodium bicarbonate. Naturally helps to regulate pH levels in the stomach, providing relief from heartburn and acid reflux.

Families are Forever
With plenty of onsite activities, The Kahala Hotel & Resort is the perfect island getaway for you and your keiki (children).
Day 1: Fun In The Sun
Soak up the warm Hawaiian sunshine at our outdoor pool and hot tub. Rent a cabana for
the day so you can lounge peacefully while the kids make a splash. With pool toys
available for purchase, they’ll never run out of things to do! When you get hungry, there’s
no need to go far. Enjoy a light meal at our poolside restaurant, Seaside Grill.
In the afternoon, get to know the playful Bottlenose Dolphins who live in our natural
water lagoon. This experience is fun for the whole family, and you’ll get to feed, play and
swim with these amazing creatures. Learn more about our partner, Dolphin Quest.
End the day with an oceanside dinner at Plumeria Beach House. Enjoy fresh
island-inspired cuisine as you watch the sun dip below the horizon.
Day 2: Explore Waikiki
In the morning, let the kids indulge their creativity at our weekly Hawaiian Culture
Classes, which include lei making, lauhala weaving and more.* View the calendar.
While they learn, why not treat yourself to a relaxing Couples Massage at the Kahala
Spa? We are proud to partner with Aloha Sitters to offer child-sitting services so you can
give yourself a much-deserved break. View spa services.
After a quick lunch at Plumeria Beach House, hop on our complimentary shuttle to the
Royal Hawaiian Center in Waikiki. From there, it’s a short walk to the Waikiki Aquarium
or Honolulu Zoo where your family can spend the afternoon marveling at the creatures of
the deep or meeting friendly beasts from around the world.
Head back to your room to freshen up and enjoy cocktails and dinner service at The
Veranda. Enjoy live music from local musicians every Thursday - Saturday from 6:00pm
- 9:00pm. Learn more.
*Activities are subject to change. Please see our events calendar for more information.
Day 3: Snorkel & Beach Adventure
Wake up bright and early to go snorkeling at the legendary Hanauma Bay. Please note
that reservations must be made in advance to enter the park.
Return home to spend a golden afternoon on the secluded beach in front of our hotel,
where the gentle waves are safe for all ages. For your convenience, we offer beach gear
including snorkels and fins, bodyboards, kayaks and paddle boards.
Create lasting memories with a sunset photo session on the beach. As a guest, you can
book a 45-minute photo shoot on our grounds with Pacific Dream Photography. Learn
more.
Afterward, tuck into a delicious meal at Arancino’s, voted Best Italian Restaurant in
Hawaii.
Sunset Sweethearts
The Kahala Hotel & Resort is a top destination for honeymoons and anniversaries. Celebrate
your love with a romantic retreat to paradise.
Day 1: Discover Kahala
Wake up to the relaxing Hawaiian tradewinds blowing through your suite and stunning
views of the mountains or sea.
Don’t let this luxury go to waste. Order our Grand Breakfast service delivered to your
door for one-of-a-kind breakfast in bed. View menu.
In the afternoon, rent a pair of our cruiser bikes to explore the beautiful neighborhood of
Kahala and soak in the gorgeous views. Stop by Kahala Mall to browse the stores and
recharge with a light meal or beverage, or see a movie.
Rest a while and freshen up, then change into your evening attire and make your way to
The Veranda, our open-air dining room. Visit Thursday - Saturday to sip delicious Mai
Tais while listening to live entertainment by Hawaii’s top local talent.
Day 2: Indulge Your Senses
On your second day, rent a car at our on-property car rental desk and head west for a
leisurely drive around Diamond Head. If it’s a Saturday, stop by the KCC Farmer’s
Market to sample fresh produce and browse handcrafted gifts. Afterward, continue on to
the eclectic neighborhood of Kaimuki, known for its vibrant art and food scene.
After returning for a short nap, head to the Kahala Spa for our signature Romance
Treatment, which includes a customized full-body massage, a deep soak tub with rose
petals and a soothing facial.
At sunset, head down to Hoku’s for a decadent four-course dinner. With views of the
ocean and a selection of wine fines, it’s the perfect place end a night a paradise.
Day 3: Lover’s Retreat
On your last morning, indulge in a late start to your day.
After brunch at Plumeria Beach House, head to the Honolulu Museum of Art for a guided
tour of Shangri La, a historic Islamic-inspired estate perched on Black Point.
Return back home to rest, or read a good book by the pool.
At golden hour, take a romantic walk on our stunning shoreline, hand-in-hand. Have your
cocktails hand-delivered from Seaside Grill as you enjoy happy hour on the beach.
For dinner, book a table for two at Arancino’s and savor the elegant flavors of Italy over a
bottle of wine.
Please ensure Javascript is enabled for purposes of
website accessibility

About Us
Waikiki's sizzling hot spot, Tropics Bar & Grill is the perfect place to experience authentic Hawaiian beach cuisine for breakfast, lunch and dinner. Enjoy innovative twists on classic comfort foods, served ocean-side on Hilton Hawaiian Village’s sublime stretch of Waikiki Beach. Savor the finest locally-sourced ingredients, including line-caught fish, succulent steaks and the freshest island greens, cooked with our chefs’ renowned dedication to seasonal ingredients.

About Our Street Food Restaurant
Our goal is to offer our customers delicious, made-to-order street food influenced by Mexican & Thai cultures and friendly service. Our menu features both traditional Mexican and Thai street food plates along with other local comfort foods, all focusing on quality and freshness. We invite you to visit our street food cart today. Or place an order for takeout or delivery.
We're located in the Maunakea Marketplace in Chinatown.

Welcome to
Honolulu Kitchen
Dine In, Grab Takeout, or Cater – Bringing Oahu’s Flavors to You!
Home of Oahu’s Famous Fried Manapuas – Taste the Tradition!
Crafted with authentic recipes and locally inspired flavors, our fried manapuas have become a must-try for both locals and visitors.
Our Resturaunt
Since opening our doors decades ago, Honolulu Kitchen has been a beloved part of the Waipahu community. Rooted in tradition, we’re known for our signature fried manapua and authentic Hawaiian flavors that locals have enjoyed for years. We’re more than just a restaurant—we’re a piece of Waipahu’s history, proudly serving comfort and connection to all who walk through our doors.
MENU
Catering
Bring the flavors of Honolulu Kitchen to your next event with our catering services! Whether it’s a family gathering, corporate event, or celebration with friends, we offer a range of delicious options – including our famous fried manapuas, bento boxes, and other island favorites – to make your event truly memorable. Let us handle the food, so you can focus on enjoying the moment with your guests.
Order Now

Retail
Hard Rock Honolulu Classic Logo Tee White
Hard Rocks Classic Logo Tee is a modern tribute to Hard Rocks legendary origins. First introduced in 1973 as a simple logo on tees for a local football team in London, this design became a global emblem of individuality, creativity, and connection through music. Its more than a shirtits a piece of Hard Rocks story, woven into a timeless design that resonates with fans around the world.
$33.00

Ask the Community
Ask a question
Q:
Do you taken reservations?
A:
No, walk in and wait in line only. If you arrive when they first open, you'll get a table right away. During peak dinner time, you're most likely in for a wait.
Al C.
2 people found this helpful
See question details
Q:
Is there parking?
A:
Yes, there are a several parking spaces in the back that are shared with other businesses.  Just before their entrance is a narrow drive to get to the parking spaces. It's one way in and follow the sign to exit.
Joyce J.

About the Business
Established in 2018. Our company is set to open our very first Lasoon in Honolulu with the support of University of Hawaii at Manoa. We intend to set up multiple food and service outlets all over state of Hawaii and beyond. Our mission is to deliver the best quality of home cooked food by providing the best service at the most reasonable prices.

Appetizers, Soups, Salads
APPETIZERS
Spring Rolls (Por Piah)
100% Vegetarian Deep-fried golden spring rolls stuffed w/ mushrooms, carrots, long rice, & spices. Served w/ slices of fresh cucumbers, mint leaves, lettuce & house sweet & sour sauce. (6 Rolls)
$12.95
Thai Egg Rolls
Ground pork, taro, long rice, carrot, onion wrapped with lumpia wrapper. Deep-fried to golden brown. Served w/ slice of fresh cucumber, mint leaves, lettuce and house sauce.
$12.95
Summer Rolls
Vegetables, marinated chicken, & blanched shrimps wrapped in soft rice paper served w/ our special house sauce. (2 Rolls)
$13.95
House Fried Chicken
Chicken seasoned w/ lemongrass and house spices then deep-fried until golden brown. Served w/ sweet & sour sauce.
$16.95
Golden Calamari
Tender Calamari seasoned, lightly battered & deep-fried golden brown. Served w/ sweet & sour sauce.
$16.95

Deboned chicken wing stuffed w/ mushrooms, carrots, long rice, chicken and spices, fried until golden brown. Served w/ sweet chili.
$17.95

$15.95

$15.95

$18.95

House-made sausage, made with pork, and fresh herbs and spices. Served with ginger and basil.

name: Khan Skewer Restaurant
raw_text:
Menu | Khan Skewer
top of page
Home
About
Menu
Contact
More
Use tab to navigate through the menu items.
FIND A TABLE
Our Menu
We serve a variety of meat, seafood, and vegetable skewers, along with appetizer and side dishes. Its signature dishes are lamb skewer, beef brisket with tendon skewer, grilled oyster, Big Island abalone and grilled eggplant. Our chef’s special dishes are crawfish, spicy stir-fry platter and grilled fish. Each skewer is made and served on the same day to ensure quality and freshness.
Our drinking menu showcases wine, sake, beer and other beverages on it drink menu. We have imported China’s well-known draft Tsingtao beer, a light lager style beer brewed by Tsingtao Brewery Co. Ltd., served in your choice of regular glass-size, a 3-liter or 4-liter pitcher for sharing with friends. We also introduced a new DIY combo drink
concept, wherein patrons order different alcoholic drinks or beverages and mix them as they wish.
​
Daily Happy Hour
Happy hour starts at 9 p.m. daily with 10% off on food items.
Mon - Wed: 5pm - 11pm​
Thu - Sun: 5pm - 1am

a private party
Skip Photo Gallery
Reviews
Start stop reviews carousel
Review by - Google
five star review by
Sophia W:
Food was delicious. Soup had many flavors to chose from! Many side options and sauce combinations to decide. It’s was all great and our server was awesome!
Review by - Google
five star review by
Alice:
Tried hotpot as the waiter suggests that is enough for a party of 2, for a larger party, their hotpot and bbq is only a few dollars more per person.We loved sliced lamb shoulder meat, duck blood, various fresh green leafy veggies, Napa cabbage, cold dishes, desserts; though I thought ice cream would be included in the desserts. Very good service from our waiters. One of the best meals we had at Honolulu. Would highly recommend!
Review by - Google
five star review by
Lilu M:
So delicious! Fast and friendly service. Great quality food and all fresh.
Review by - Google
five star review by
Lady D:
I’m so happy that this hot pot opened near my house. First time have dinner here and it’s so delicious, fresh food, clean and great service. Definitely back here with my friends next time.

Cart
Can’t dine-in? Order takeout by calling (808) 941-1115 and enjoy your hot pot at home.
Takeout Options
If you are unable to join us for a dine-in experience, we have the following takeout options available (McCully location only). Note: In order to ensure freshness, the Couple Set and Family Set options will need to be cooked at home.
Couple Set - $35
See details
Family Set - $78
See details
Ordering is as simple as 1-2-3
Choose a broth
Choose your add ins
Checkout (pay at pickup)
Dine-in Menu
Broths
Chicken
8.99
Our signature clear and delicate chicken broth made from fresh chicken simmered for hours in a bouquet of herbs and spices and garnished with chopped spring onions.
Beef
$8.99
A rich beef broth made from beef bones simmered for hours in a bouquet of star anise, toasted ginger and onion and garnished with thinly sliced onion. A favorite for Pho lovers!
Vegan
$9.99
Our deliciously sweet and flavorful vegan broth is made from hours of simmering cauliflower, cabbage and carrot in a bouquet of aromatic spices and herbs.
Thai
$9.99
Our signature chicken broth spiced up with homemade pickled Chinese cabbage, lemongrass, ginger, lime leaves and garnished with Thai basil.
Tofu
$9.99
Our signature chicken broth with the addition of nutritious silken tofu and garnished with fresh spring onion.
Canh Chua
$10.99
Our signature chicken broth sweetened with fresh, locally grown Hawaiian pineapples and garnished with shallot crisps.
Miso
$8.99
Our take on the classic Japanese Miso soup with velvety seaweed and garnished with fresh spring onion.
Kimchi
$9.99
If you love kimchee, then you will fall in love all over again with this fantastic broth made from Hot Pot Heaven's homemade kimchee.
Seafood
$10.99
Our seafood broth made with sauteed shrimp and tender crab meat is seasoned with Cajun spices and garnished with fresh spring onion and cilantro.
Mushroom
$10.99
Our signature chicken broth enriched with a medley of sauteed mushrooms and garnished with fresh spring onion.

Home

/
Our Story
/
Write to Us
/
Wholesale
/
Order Online
/
Mahalo, Hawaii, for voting us #1 for manapua!!  We are so humbled and grateful for the recognition.
From a small noodle shop in 1942 to where we are now, we could not have done it without you.
What we make and how we make it matters to us.
We believe that the best food is made from scratch, every time, even if it takes a little more effort.
As a local family for three generations, we understand what it means to be from Hawaii, and, we value what makes our island home special.  As a part of our principle of cooking, we are committed to using locally sourced ingredients as often as possible.
ALWAYS MADE FROM SCRATCH
LOCALLY SOURCED

Small but Friendly Taiwanese Eatery in Chinatown culture plaza, Honolulu! Various Noodle and tawainese food for lunch and dinner.   BYOB welcomed!
We moved!  Please find us in front of Legend seafood restaurant.   We also have a new menu and business hours.

Ask the Community
Ask a question
Q:
Do you homemade the wrappers (skins) for your dumplings?  Homemade wrappers really make the dumplings more flavorful.
A:
unfortunately, we do not.  We get them fresh from the factory.   We found that factory made ones are better suited for our purpose.   Flavourful and consistency is what we are aiming for.
Brian W., Business Owner

Q:
Do they take lunch reservations?
A:
For party of 5 or more.  We recommend that you make reservation for lunch and dinner.
Brian W.

Explore KuruKuru Sushi's menu, a fusion of tradition and taste. Savor our conveyor belt selections, from classic nigiri to innovative maki rolls. Indulge in hot Japanese specialties, udon, and vegetarian delights. Crafted with the freshest ingredients, our menu caters to all. Visit us at Pearl Kai or Kahala Mall for an unforgettable sushi experience.

Family Origins
Discover KuruKuru Sushi's rich heritage, founded in 2003 by culinary pioneers Tetsuo and Mieko Goto. Embraced by Lance Yamamoto since 2004, our family's legacy, rooted in a restaurant dynasty since 1968 Japan, flourishes in Hawaii. We celebrate our growth thanks to our dedicated team and cherished patrons. Join our journey of diverse Japanese culinary art, a story of passion and tradition, now serving you at Kahala Mall.

name: Ramen Nakamura
raw_text:
Ramen Nakamura Menu (update September 2025)
Skip to content
Ramen Nakamura
HOME
About
Menu
Services
Photos
Ramen Nakamura Menu
For more information, please contact the following the phone number:
+1 808-922-7960.
Irresistible Ramen Varieties at Ramen Nakamura
A symphony of flavors has been orchestrated through the restaurant’s exceptional ramen offerings, each bowl carefully crafted to deliver a transcendent culinary experience. The Oxtail Ramen emerges as the crown jewel, representing the pinnacle of gastronomic excellence. Intricate preparation techniques have been developed to extract maximum flavor from premium ingredients. The Oxtail Ramen is distinguished by its profoundly rich broth, slowly simmered to achieve an unparalleled depth of flavor. Tender oxtail meat is meticulously prepared, falling effortlessly from the bone and infusing the broth with complex, umami-rich characteristics. Spice variations have been ingeniously incorporated to cater to diverse palate preferences. The standard oxtail ramen offers a nuanced flavor profile, while the spicy alternative provides an electrifying culinary experience. Carefully calibrated heat levels ensure that the underlying complexity of the dish remains prominent.
Noodle preparation has been elevated to an art form. Handcrafted noodles are precisely engineered to achieve the perfect texture – resilient yet delicate, capable of absorbing the intricate broths while maintaining structural integrity. Multiple noodle thicknesses and compositions have been developed to complement different ramen styles. Signature specialty ramens have been introduced to challenge traditional flavor boundaries. The Garlic Lovers Ramen represents a bold culinary statement, featuring multiple preparations of garlic that transform the dish into a multi-dimensional flavor experience. Roasted, crisp-fried, and infused garlic varieties are strategically incorporated to create a revolutionary taste profile.
Diverse Culinary Menu
A comprehensive culinary ecosystem has been meticulously developed at Ramen Nakamura, extending far beyond traditional ramen offerings. The menu has been carefully constructed to provide a holistic dining experience that celebrates Japanese comfort food in all its complexity. Complementary dishes have been elevated from mere side items to culinary attractions in the own right. Gyoza represents a pinnacle of precision, featuring hand-crafted dumplings with impossibly delicate wrappers. Each dumpling is prepared with surgical precision, achieving a golden-brown crispness that becomes a sensory experience. Fried rice has been transformed into a sophisticated dish that transcends its humble origins. Each grain is individually treated, separated, and infused with a depth of flavor that tells a complex culinary narrative. Garlic emerges as a signature ingredient, adding layers of aromatic complexity to the preparation. Beverage selections have been curated to complement the intricate flavor profiles of the menu. Premium beer options have been carefully chosen to create harmonious pairing experiences. Each beverage is selected to enhance and elevate the dining experience, providing a comprehensive gastronomic journey.
Ramen Nakamura

Featured
LINK UP ON SOCIAL MEDIA
@goendiningandbar
“Me, my husband and two friends enjoyed a lovely evening, sitting outside, eating the delicious food. Everything was delish but I think the brown butter cheesecake was my favorite!!”
-Trudy A.  ★★★★★
“The fry basket was so good! Mushrooms were plump and tasty, tako app was delicious as well! For dinner we spilt the duck entree with agnolotti pasta . The duck was so tender!! I'm sure I could have ate it with a spoon. Pasta was filled with a sweet corn purée a little sweet and savory.
Overall had a great night, service, food and and drinks were amazing.”
-Jen L.  ★★★★★
“For lunch I decided to try the ochazuke which again was a huge portion of salmon in a large bowl with an assortment of pickles, vegetables and rice. Served with a big hot pot of tea which you pour into your bowl. I grew up loving ochazuke at my grandmother's kitchen table and this just made me happy on every level.”
-Emi H.  ★★★★★
Subscribe to our insider VIP newsletter!
Subscribe
Yoichi Saito,
Executive Chef
Daiya Fujiki,
General Manager
Chef driven and crave-worthy, the GOEN Dining + Bar menu is a combination of creative “New American” dishes showcasing Hawaii's vibrant local flavors in a hip & refreshing atmosphere. Seared fresh fish dishes, roasted meat preparations, carefully crafted pasta selections, fresh salads & creative sushi presentations bring guests a time-honored dining experience that only Roy Yamaguchi & his team can.

allergen chart
2 Hour limit. Entire party must order from the same menu. Offer valid for dine in only, no to-go orders. All food must be consumed at the restaurant:
Leftovers cannot be taken home. Extra charges will be applied to unfinished food.
Maximum 2 split checks per party (table). Children 4 & under are free. Children 5 to 10 years old are half price.
Certain menu items do NOT include nuts, nut oils, or traces of peanuts, but have sesame oil.
Pork Belly Disclaimer: some cuts may contain rib cartilage (gristle) on Korean style pork belly (samgyubsal). Please use caution while chewing.

Now Serving Specialty Cakes, Made to Order for Your Special Occasion!
Pre-orders 72 hours in advance REQUIRED. If a cake order is not placed 72 hours in advance, there will be a $10 rush fee added to the cake price. If you are bringing in your own cake to dine in with us, there will be a $30 cake-cutting fee for up to 15 people and $3/person for any amount above that.
SPECIALTY CAKE MENU
Japanese + American cuisine by Chef Jason Peel
Nami Kaze is open for dinner service only
WEDNESDAY – SUNDAY: Dinner @ 4:30pm-8:30pm
We are closed MONDAY – TUESDAY.
DINNER MENU
SPECIALTY CAKES
MAKE A RESERVATION
Nami Kaze Hawaii is the story of Chef Peel’s culinary journey. Combining the flavors from his hometown of Kaua‘i, and the decades of experience working with Hawaii’s top culinary leaders and chef’s from around the world.  With the knowledge gathered from managing some of Hawaii’s most iconic restaurants, to teaching culinary courses at KCC and in Hawaii’s classrooms, Nami Kaze Hawaii’s menu is a melting pot of culinary creativity.
With a farmer-focused approach, guests can expect to embark on a culinary adventure, enjoying creations that reflect Peel’s appreciation for the produce and provisions found throughout the state.

Trio of Seared Nigiri- Hawaiian Ahi with Scarion Sauce, Salmon with yuzu tofu mousse, Blue shrimp with Island egg tartar. Served with island egg yolk shoyu sauce.
Original Pipikaula | オリジナルピピカウラ
$18.00
One of Hawaiian appetizers. Hawaiian Style Dry-Aged short rib. A very famous and popular Hawaiian favorite. ｜ハワイの伝統料理のピピカウラジーニアスラウンジ風です。マル秘たれに漬け込んだ骨付きカルビを数日干して調理します。
Kalua Pork Nachos│カルーアポークナチョス
$13.00/Small
$19.00/Regular
Wantan Chips, Jalapeno Cheese, Kalua Pork, Pico de Gallo, Green Onion
Hawaiian Rib Eye Steak│ハワイアン串刺しリブアイステーキ
$46.00/10 oz
Skewered beef rib eye steak on top of mash potatos served with Hawaiian BBQ sauce. 2/3 LB
100% Beef Loco Moco  in a Hot Stone Bowl│100%ビーフの石焼きヴォルケーノロコモコ
$20.00
Old time Japanese faborite, instead of the regular loco moco style gravy, served with a warm mouth watering homemade demi-glace sauce. Hot lava sauce on the side.
Aloha Tofu & Ahi Loco Moco | アロハ豆腐とアヒのロコモコ
$22.00
The patty is made with Hawaiian wild caught ahi and Aloha Tofu, topped with our original Loco Moco sauce, garlic cream sauce, and a sunny-side-up made from two eggs.
Lemon Butter Garlic Jumbo Shrimp│オリジナルガーリックシュリンプ
$22.00
Sauteed  Jumbo white shrimp mixed with our original lemon butter garlic sauce.
Ahi Poke Chirashi Bowl│アヒポケちらし丼 (醤油、味噌、スパイシー）
$19.00
Ahi poke with white rice topped with furikake, green & white onions, Tobiko, seaweed, and shredded egg. Dressed with our original homemade sauce. You can choose any sauce you like: Shoyu, Miso, Spicy Mayo.
Raw Fresh Oyster│生カキ (ハバネロガーリックカクテルソース、ピクルス酢）
$6.00/1pc
$30.00/6pc
Fresh raw oysters from the Mainland（Ask your server for today's oyster harvest location). Served with spicy hot cocktail sauce and pickled vinegar. Fresh squeezed lemon and sauce of your choice.
Avocado Roll Sushi Tempura with Pico de Ahi│アボカドロール寿司天ぷらアヒポケ乗せ
$20.00
Avocado sushi roll tempura topped with fresh caught ahi, pico de gallo, original mac nut sweet chili sauce, ogo, green onion, and white sesame.
Avocado Roll Sushi Tempura with Shrimp Dynamite | アボカドロール寿司天ぷら  シュリンプダイナマイト
$20.00
Avocado sushi roll tempura topped with shrimp topped with homemade tartar sauce dynamite style. Eal sauce drizzled. Green onion, fried onion, tobiko.
Surf & Turf│サーフ＆ターフ
$40.00
1/3 LB of beef rib eye steaks and 6 piece of our original lemon butter garlic shrimps.
Menu
Ahi ＆Salmon Carpacio w/ Tofu Mousse | アヒとサーモンのカルパッチョ アロハ豆腐のムース添え
$20.00

$10.00
Aloha Tofu and rich cream blended into a smooth yuzu-flavored mousse. Served with white soy sauce.

Sushi

7 piece nigiri and 2 California rolls
Includes salmon, ahi, hamachi, tamago, ika
Plate Lunches
*All plate lunches include rice and takuan (Japanese pickled daikon)
Dynamite Plate - $15.00
Salmon, onions, and mushrooms grilled with Chokatsu’s special sauce, served with a side of rice
Shoyu Pork Plate - $17.00 a need pre order
Slow braised Okinawan style shoyu pork, served with rice, and slices of takuwan
Pork Katsu Plate - $15.00
Large portion of crispy pork katsu, served with rice
Pork Tofu Plate - $13.00
Sliced pork, tofu, and cabbage cooked in delicious dashi broth and served with rice
Pork Bitter Melon Plate - $13.00
Sliced pork stir-fried with tofu, egg, and bitter melon cooked in delicious dashi broth, served with rice
Okinawan Stir-Fried Noodles - $13.00
Soba noodles stir-fried in oyster sauce with sliced spam, cabbage, green onion, red ginger, and chives
Okinawan Stir-Fried Vegetables - $13.00
Okinawan Stir-Fried Vegetables, rice, and takuwan
Okinawan Style Tempura Plate - $14.00
Okinawan style tempura made with a delicious mix of seafood, onion, green and red pepper, fish cake, served with rice
Bentos
*ask for included sides
Salmon Bento - $13.00
Fried salmon, served with rice, potato salad, tamagoyaki, and Okinawan shoyu pork
Pork Katsu Bento - $13.00
Crispy pork katsu, served with rice, salad, potato salad, tamagoyaki, and Okinawan shoyu pork
Soups
*All soups come with a side of rice
Okinawan Soba - $14.00
Soba noodles served with hot dashi broth, topped with fish cake, green onion, red ginger, and shoyu spare rib
Spare Rib Soup - $14.00
Tender spare rib served in dashi broth, daikon, and mustard cabbage along with a side of rice
Special Miso Soup - $14.00
Authentic Okinawan miso soup, filled with shrimp, shrimp stock, daikon, wakame, eggs, served with a side of rice
Pig’s Feet Soup - $14.00
Known as Ashitibichi in Okinawa, pigs feet boiled in dashi broth, with radish, mustard cabbage, and konbu, served with a side of rice
Sushi & Soup Combo
Your choice of soup with an 8 piece sushi plate! - $19.00

Welcome to Izakaya Tenkichi
Tenkichi is a Japanese restaurant located in Honolulu, Hawaii. We offer a wide variety of authentic Japanese cuisine including Tempura, Sushi, Handrolls, and our new Atemaki dish. Our dishes are made with only the freshest and highest quality ingredients, ensuring a delicious and unforgettable dining experience. Come and join us for a meal today!
View Dinner Menu
View Lunch Menu
Due to limited seating, please note that our window-side tables are generally reserved for parties of three or more. For parties of two, we kindly ask for your understanding that seating will be at the counter bar or at a two-person table.
Reservation
Please call us for the party of 6 or more

About the Business
Olay’s Thai Lao Cuisine is where bold flavors, family vibes, and good times come together! We serve up authentic Thai and Lao dishes that are soo SAAP! (that’s “delicious” for the uninitiated).

We’re a BYOB spot—bring your favorite drinks, and we’ll keep them chilled with ice on the house! Whether you're here for a cozy dinner, a feast with friends, or just some seriously good food, we’ve got you covered.

Come hungry, bring your crew, and let’s make it a meal to remember!
…
Read more
Ask the Community
Ask a question
Q:
Are reservations still required in 2025? Can't find anything on their website.
A:
Thanks for reaching out! Reservations aren’t required, but they’re always a good idea, especially during peak hours. Walk-ins are welcome, and we’ll do our best to seat you as quickly as possible!…
more
Shelby B., Business Manager

Q:
Is the restaurant dog friendly?
A:
Yes! Olay's Thai Lao Cuisine is dog-friendly in our outdoor dining area. We love welcoming furry friends! 🐶💕 We just ask that pups stay leashed and well-behaved to ensure a great experience for all our guests. Hope to see you and your four-legged…
more

Located at 91-896 Makule Road,

Call Us Today
Freshly Made…
Our Appetizer And Salad Menu
Whether you just want something light to eat or you're warming up for a big dinner, you can always find the appetizer or salad you love at Ono Thai Cuisine. We offer a full range of authentic Thai cuisine for you to try! Dine in with us today or order
take-out
. Ask us about our weekly specials! Call us today - 808-689-5808!
Our Menu
Appetizers
Spring Rolls “Poh Pia Tod”
Crispy rolls served with Thai sweet chili sauce.
Summer Rolls “Poh Pia Sod”
Freshly wrapped shrimps, veggies and mints on rice paper served with Thai style peanut sauce.
Fish Cake Patties “Tod Mun Plah”
Hot And Spicy!! Made with fish paste, Thai red curry paste, and long beans. Deep fried till golden brown. Served with Thai sweet chili sauce.
Chicken Satay Sticks “Satay”
Marinated Chicken meat on a stick grilled to perfection served with Thai style peanut sauce.
Thai Fried Chicken “Gai Tod”
Mixed herb and curry batter deep fried till golden brown served with Thai sweet sauce!!
Fried Calamari “Plah Muek Tod”
Deep fried crispy calamari served with house seafood sauce.
Ono App combo
Spring rolls, Fish Patties, and Chicken Satay
Salads “yum”
Papaya salad “som tum”
Choice of Lao or Thai style
Cucumber salad “tum tang”
Choice of Thai or Lao style
Seafood salad “yum talay”
Shrimp, calamari, and scallops tossed in house seafood sauce with seasonal Thai herbs and veggies.
Clear noodle salad “yum woonsen”
Bean thread noodle, meat, veggies and Thai herbs tossed in sweet and sour house sauce
Choice of: Chicken, Beef, or Shrimp
Eggplant Salad “yum mak kuea”
Shredded roast eggplant, ground pork, Thai herbs tossed in Thai house sweet & spicy house sauce.
Tofu salad “yum tao Hoo”
Pan fried tofu, onions, cucumber, tomatoes, cilantro and mint tossed in a sweet sour house sauce.
Thai style garden salad “yum pak”
Seasonal greens, cilantro, onions, tossed in house dressing.
Beef salad “Yum nam tok"
Thinly sliced grilled beef, cucumbers, carrots, onions, Cilantro and mints tossed in sweet spicy house sauce.
Larb
Ground chicken or Beef tossed in lime juice, fish sauce, roasted rice with mint and lettuce.
808-689-5808
About Ono Thai Cuisine
Ono Thai Cuisine provides quality homemade Thai food in a cozy and family-friendly dining atmosphere. Dine-in with us or order
take-out
. Please call ahead to book a large party so we can accommodate all your guests! Walk-ins are very much welcome.
Ask about our weekly specials for lunch and dinner! We have lots of parking space available so it's always convenient to dine with us!

MENU

Reservations
HOME
MENU
CONTACT
Reservations
HOME
MENU
CONTACT
Reservations
Khao Soi with chicken OR tofu $15
Thank you so much to everyone who stopped by to celebrate our 16th year anniversary by checking out our August Khao Soi Special! Due to popular demand, we decided to
add this to our regular menu!
For those who have never tried it, here is a quick explanation on the different yummy flavors it contains:
Originating from Chiang Mai, this dish combines turmeric, black cardamom and galangal to create a rich, savory, and slightly sweet broth. Mix in all of the yummy
toppings (cilantro, shallot, mustard greens, crispy wonton and soft egg noodle, chili oil) for a flavorful and comforting meal :)
~ HOW TO ORDER ~
- This applies to the following entrees: Curries, Soups, Noodle Stir Fry, Fried Rice, Stir Fried Veggies.
- Price will be determined based on which protein you choose. If a dish is ordered as vegetarian or with just veggies, broccoli will be
added in place of a protein (exception being the Ong Bak dish)
- PLEASE choose your spice level carefully as Thai food can get pretty hot! We can definitely give you extra spice on the side but we are
unable to remove it once cooked in. Mahalo for your understanding :)
1: Choose a Protein!
$18 - Tofu, Chicken
$19 - Beef, Shrimp, Fish or Squid
$21 Seafood Combo (Shrimp, Fish AND Squid)
2: How Spicy?
0* - No Spice
1/2* - American Mild
1* - American Medium
2* - American Hot
3* - Thai Low
4* - Thai Medium
5* - Thai Hot
3: Modifications or Allergies
Please let us know if you have any food intolerances/
preferences (vegan, gluten free, peanut allergy, etc) and we will happily prepare your food accordingly.
We reserve the right to refuse services and return on food. If you end up struggling with the spice, we are always willing to help out by giving you extra noodles, rice, or coconut milk to try and
balance it out. Aside from this though, please try to choose your spice level carefully as we are unable to give refunds or remake dishes if they are considered too spicy.
Please take note that for parties of 5 or more there will be a 20% gratuity/service fee.
Thank you for your understanding and Mahalo!
Accepted payment methods
MasterCard, Visa, American Express, Credit Card, Giftcard

Summer Roll (Goi Cuon)
Fresh rolls filled with boiled shrimps, rice noodle, crisp lettuce, and fresh mint.
Summer Roll w/ BBQ Chicken or Pork(Goi Cuon Thit  Nuong)
Fresh rolls filled with grilled marinated chicken or pork, rice noodles, crisp lettuce, and fresh mint.
Spring Roll (Cha Gio)
Deep fried rolls filled with ground pork, long rice, carrots, mushrooms, and spices. Served with rice noodles, lettuce, cucumbers, mint leaves, and our house fish sauce.
Vegan Spring Rolls
Deep fried rolls filled with cabbage, long rice, shallot, taro, wood ear mushroom, shitake mushroom, rolled in rice paper. Served with lettuce, cucumbers, mint leaves and our sweet Thai sauce.
Thai Spring Roll
Four deep fried rolls filled with ground pork, long rice, carrots, cabbage, mushrooms, and spices rolled in rice paper. Served with lettuce, cucumbers, mint leaves and our sweet Thai sauce.
Tiger Shrimp Rolls (Cha Gio Tom)
Eight marinated whole shrimps individually rolled and deep fried to a golden brown. Served with sweet Thai sauce.
House Special Wings
Marinated chicken wings coated in rice flour and fried to a crisp, tossed in a special sauce.
Stuffed Chicken Wings
De-boned and stuffed chicken wings filled with ground pork, long rice, carrots, mushrooms, and spices. Breaded and deep fried to a golden brown, Served with sweet Thai sauce.
Chicken Sateh
Four boneless chicken skewers marinated with coconut red curry. Served with a side of sateh sauce.
Crispy Calamari
Calamari steak lightly breaded and deep fried to a golden brown and served with a sweet Thai sauce.
Coconut Shrimp
Eight pieces, served with wasabi sweet chili Aioli sauce.

name: Maile's Thai Bistro
raw_text:
HAWAII KAI TOWNE CENTER MAILE’S THAI AT WARD
(808) 394-2488 (808) 591-2488
333 KEAHOLE STREET 1200 ALA MOANA BLVD.
HONOLULU, HI 96825 HONOLULU, HI 96814
APPETIZERS
RICE PAPER WRAPPED ROLLS
Lettuce, cucumber, bean sprouts and noodles with your choice of protein wrapped in soft rice paper served with our special house peanut sauce.
CHICKEN ROLLS | Seasoned chicken ........................................$15 MAILE ROLLS | Blanched shrimp and seasoned ground pork ....$16
SUMMER ROLLS | Blanched shrimp ..........................................$15 VEGAN TOFU ROLLS | Broiled yaki tofu ...............................$13
TOFU ROLLS | Broiled yaki tofu......................................................$13 VEGAN VEGETARIAN ROLLS | Vegetables only ............$13
SPRING ROLLS ............................................................................................................................................$18
Deep-fried golden spring rolls stuffed with carrots, long rice, onions, ground pork and spices. Served with slices of fresh cucumber, mint, lettuce and sweet & sour sauce. (6 rolls)
VEGETARIAN SPRING ROLLS .................................................................................................................$18
Deep-fried golden spring rolls stuffed with carrots, long rice, onions, and spices. Served with slices of fresh cucumber, mint, lettuce and sweet & sour sauce. (6 rolls)
THAI FRIED CHICKEN ...............................................................................................................................$17
Chicken seasoned with lemongrass and Thai spices then deep fried until golden brown served with sweet chili sauce.
CHICKEN SATAY (SA-TEH) .......................................................................................................................$17
Chicken breast kebabs marinated in curry spices then sauteed with coconut milk. Served with peanut sauce and pickled vegetables. (4 skewers)
ANGEL WINGS ............................................................................................................................................$18
Crisp bone-in wings seasoned with Thai spices. Served with chili aioli sauce. (9 pieces)
GOLDEN CALAMARI .................................................................................................................................$19
Tender calamari seasoned, lightly battered and deep fried until golden. Served with sweet chili sauce.
THAI SHORT RIBS .......................................................................................................................................$21
Cross cut beef short ribs marinated in a sweet soy ginger sauce grilled and fi nished with cilantro and green onions.
PORK JERKY ................................................................................................................................................$16
Pork seasoned and marinated in Thai spices deep fried until crisp. Served with a chili soy sauce.
CRISPY WONTON .....................................................................................................................................$15
Minced pork and onions seasoned in Thai spices wrapped in wonton, deep fried until golden and served with a chili aioli sauce. (13 pieces)
GARLIC SOY EDAMAME ...........................................................................................................................$10
Edamame sauteed in sizzling oyster garlic sauce.
COLD TOFU ....................................................................................................................................................$9
Refreshing tofu blocks topped with thinly sliced ginger, cilantro and green onions drizzled with our house ginger soy chili sauce.
THAI SCETTA ................................................................................................................................................$12
Cherry tomatoes, Thai sweet basil, and red onions seasoned with a balsamic vinaigrette. Served on toasted French bread.
FRENCH FRIES ...............................................................................................................................................$8
Shoestring fries cooked to a crisp.
HAMACHI KAMA .................................................................................................................MARKET PRICE
Japanese style hamachi collar lightly seasoned and deep fried to a crisp topped with garlic soy sauce. Served with chili soy sauce and garlic lime sauce.
RECOMMENDED SPICY GLUTEN FREE
*Consuming raw or undercooked meats, poultry, seafood, shellfi sh, or eggs may increase your risk of foodborne illness, especially if you have a certain
medical condition. Our food may contain peanuts, tree nuts, wheat, egg, milk or soy products. Please ask your server if you have any concerns.
SALADS
GREEN PAPAYA SALAD (SOM TOM) ....................................................................................................$16
Shredded green papaya, fresh tomatoes, long bean and house tamarind sauce. Served with crunchy peanuts. Add Shrimp $3.00
THAI SALAD ..................................................................................................................................................$14
Romaine lettuce tossed with onions, tomatoes, cilantro, green onions, carrots and egg with homemade sweet and tangy dressing. Topped with garlic and crunchy peanuts.
Add Chicken $2.00
LAAB SALAD (CHICKEN OR BEEF OR PORK) ..................................................................................$18
Your choice of minced meat tossed with fresh herbs, Thai spices, onions, cilantro, mint green onions. Served with a wedge of cabbage.
GLASS NOODLE SALAD (YUM WOON SEN)
Long rice tossed with tomatoes, onions, cucumbers, mint leaves, cilantro, green onions and a tangy Thai dressing over romaine lettuce
TOFU OR VEGETABLE $17 BEEF, CHICKEN, PORK, $18 SHRIMP $21 SEAFOOD OR FISH $23
SOUPS
WONTON SOUP ..........................................................................................................................................$16
Our homemade pork wontons simmered with choy sum in a mild broth. Topped with green onions, cilantro and crispy garlic.
PHO THAI STYLE ........................................................................................................................................$17
Rice noodle with beef balls and rare steak in a homemade broth. Topped with green onions, cilantro, onions and crispy garlic. Served with fresh Thai basil, bean sprouts, sriracha and
hoisin sauce.
DRAGON LADY SOUP ...............................................................................................................................$18
Char siu pork, choy sum, and wontons with saimin noodles in a homemade broth.
SPICY LEMONGRASS SOUP (TOM YUM) (SPICY)
Prepared with mushrooms, tomatoes, lemongrass, Thai ginger and kaffi r lime leaves and your choice of protein in a special house broth. (medium or hot)
SHRIMP $19 SEAFOOD $21 TOFU $16 CHICKEN $17
THAI GINGER SOUP (TOM KHA)
Tangy broth prepared with Thai ginger, tomatoes, mushrooms. Topped with cilantro and lightly sweetened with coconut milk.
SHRIMP $21 SEAFOOD $23 TOFU $17 CHICKEN $19
CURRIES
YELLOW CURRY (KAENG LEUNG) MASAMAN CURRY (MASAMAN NEUA)
House yellow curry sauce, coconut milk, potatoes, carrots and onions. Masaman curry sauce, coconut milk, potatoes, carrots, onions and whole peanuts.
RED CURRY (KAENG PED DAENG) PANANG CURRY
House red curry sauce, coconut milk, young bamboo shoots and sweet Thai basil. Thick red curry, coconut milk, bell peppers, onions and basil blended with peanut sauce.
GREEN CURRY (KAENG KIEW WAN) PINEAPPLE CURRY (GAENG SAPAROT)
House green curry sauce, coconut milk, eggplant and sweet Thai basil. Red curry with coconut milk, onions, bell peppers, pineapple and sweet Thai basil.
TOFU OR VEGETABLE $18 SEAFOOD OR FISH $24 SHRIMP $21 BEEF, CHICKEN, PORK $19
NOODLES
RICE NOODLES WITH BEAN SPROUTS STIR-FRIED LONG RICE NOODLES
(PAD THAI) (PAD WOON SEN)
Thai rice noodles prepared in a sizzling wok with egg, bean sprouts and chives. Served Bean thread (long rice) noodles stir-fried in a sizzling wok with young corn, mushrooms,
with fresh bean sprouts and crunchy peanuts. (Gluten free by request) celery, egg, carrots and bean sprouts in soy sauce. Topped with cilantro.
CHOW FUN SOY SAUCE (PAD SIEW) SPICY BASIL NOODLES (PAD KI MAO)
Chow fun noodles prepared in a sizzling wok with broccoli, egg and soy sauce. Chow fun noodles prepared in a sizzling wok with garlic, egg, basil, bean sprouts,
broccoli and chili sauce.
TOFU OR VEGETABLE $18 SEAFOOD OR FISH $24 SHRIMP $21 BEEF, CHICKEN, PORK $19
SPICE LEVELS: MILD, MEDIUM, HOT, THAI HOT ($1), LAO HOT ($2), MAILE HOT ($3)
Please be careful when requesting your spice level as we CANNOT take a spicy dish back and remake it mild.
FRIED RICE
THAI FRIED RICE
Rice fried with egg, onion, tomato, green onions and Thai spices. Topped with cilantro and served with slices of cucumber. Add pineapple $1. Add Basil $1
TOFU OR VEGETABLE $17 BEEF, CHICKEN, PORK $18 SHRIMP $20 SEAFOOD OR FISH $22
HOUSE FRIED RICE .......................................................................................................$18 (NO CHOICE)
Fried rice with egg, tomato, char siu pork, spam and green onions. Topped with cilantro and served with slices of cucumber.
BOWL OF RICE ....................................................................................................................$4 PER ORDER
8oz choice of jasmine, sticky or brown rice
VEGETABLE A LA CARTE
CHOY SUM GARLIC SAUCE (PAD PAK PAGGAD) ............................................................................$17
Chinese broccoli steamed and topped with sesame seed oil and garlic sauce.
ONG CHOY TOFU (PAD BUNG TOFU) ................................................................................................$17
Chinese water spinach with tofu sauteed in a sizzling wok with yellow bean sauce topped with crispy garlic.
SPICY TOFU MIXED VEGETABLES (PAD PED TOFU) .....................................................................$17
Tofu sauteed with onions, straw mushrooms, long bean, bamboo shoots, bell peppers and basil.
GARLIC VEGETABLES (PAD KRA TEIM) ..............................................................................................$17
Tofu sauteed with broccoli, carrots, young corn, cabbage, and straw mushrooms in a savory garlic sauce.
STIR-FRIED ENTREE
THAI LOCO MOCO ....................................................................................................................................$19
Your choice of beef, chicken or pork sauteed with onions, Thai basil and bell peppers. Served over your choice of rice (jasmine, sticky or brown) topped with an over easy egg.
SWEET AND SOUR (PIO WAN) CASHEW (PAD MET MAMUANG)
Sauteed onions, bell peppers, cucumber, tomato and pineapple in a sweet and sour Roasted cashew nuts with onions, bell peppers in our savory house sauce. Topped with
sauce. cilantro.
EVIL PRINCESS (PAD PED) ONG CHOY (PAD PAK BUNG)
Thick red curry sauce, onions, bamboo shoots, long beans and Thai basil. Chinese water spinach sauteed with garlic in a savory sauce.
SIZZLING BASIL EGGPLANT (PAD MAH KUA)
Long beans, onions and Thai basil in a chili sauce. Sauteed eggplant, basil and garlic with a savory sauce.
THAI GARLIC (PAD KA TIEM)
Sauteed garlic, onions and bell pepper in our savory Thai garlic sauce. Topped with
cilantro.
TOFU OR VEGETABLE $17 BEEF, CHICKEN, PORK, $18 SHRIMP $21 SEAFOOD OR FISH $23
FISH
SWEET AND SOUR BASA (PLA PRIO WAHN) ...................................................................................$23
Crispy deep-fried basa sauteed with tomato, cucumber, onions, bell peppers, and garlic in a savory sweet and sour sauce. Our sweet & sour stir fry with crispy deep-fried basa.
GARLIC LIME ...............................................................................................................................................$23
Crispy deep-fried basa topped in our house garlic lime sauce and cilantro.
GARLIC SOY FISH ......................................................................................................................................$23
Panko breaded Basa seasoned and deep-fried then topped with crispy garlic soy sauce.
RECOMMENDED SPICY GLUTEN FREE
SPICE LEVELS: MILD, MEDIUM, HOT, THAI HOT ($1), LAO HOT ($2), MAILE HOT ($3)
Please be careful when requesting your spice level as we CANNOT take a spicy dish back and remake it mild.
SEAFOOD
SPICY SEAFOOD COMBO (PAD PED HOM MID) ............................................................................$24
Tiger shrimp, scallop and calamari sauteed in a sizzling wok with onions, chili, garlic, bell peppers, bamboo shoots, mushroom, long bean and fresh Thai basil. Add clams $6
THAI GARLIC SHRIMP (KUNG KA TIEM) ............................................................................................$21
Tiger Shrimp lightly sauteed in garlic, onions, bell peppers and our savory garlic sauce.
EVIL SHRIMP (PAD PED KUNG) .............................................................................................................$21
Tiger Shrimp sauteed in a thick red curry sauce with onions, bamboo, long bean and fresh basil.
THAI SPICY CLAMS ...................................................................................................................................$20
Fresh Manila clams sauteed with bell peppers and basil in a savory garlic chili sauce. Served with toasted French bread.
VEGAN MENU
(NO FISH SAUCE, NO OYSTER SAUCE, NO EGG AND MUSHROOM BROTH SUBSTITUTE)
VEGAN EVIL PRINCESS (PAD PED) ......................................................................................................$18
Stir-fried vegetables in thick yellow curry sauce, onions, bamboo shoots, long beans and Thai basil.
VEGAN SPECIAL .........................................................................................................................................$18
Seasonal vegetables stir-fried in a sizzling wok with a savory sauce.
VEGAN YELLOW CURRY .........................................................................................................................$18
House yellow curry sauce, coconut milk, broccoli, carrots, cabbage, potatoes, and onions.
VEGAN FRIED RICE ....................................................................................................................................$18
Fried rice with tomatoes, onions, broccoli, carrot and cabbage. (Choice of jasmine, brown or sticky)
VEGAN PAD SIEW .......................................................................................................................................$18
Chow fun noodles, carrots, broccoli and cabbage prepared in a sizzling wok with soy sauce.
VEGAN PAD THAI .......................................................................................................................................$18
Rice noodles with tofu, carrots, cabbage, broccoli, bean sprouts and chives prepared in a sizzling hot wok. Served with peanuts.
DESSERT
CHEESECAKE .............................................................................................................................................$10
Homemade cheesecake.
THAI CREPE ..................................................................................................................................................$12
A fl aky and chewy crepe fi lled with condensed milk drizzled in chocolate. Served with a scoop of coconut gelato.
FRESH MANGO WITH STICKY RICE (SEASONAL) ..........................................................................$13
Warm coconut sticky rice topped with freshly sliced mango.
TAPIOCA WITH FRUIT ...............................................................................................................................$10
Our homemade coconut tapioca topped with fresh fruits.
GELATO (VANILLA OR COCONUT) .......................................................................................................$7

MANGO SORBET ..........................................................................................................................................$7

BEVERAGES

Uahi Island Grill
Steak salad
A drink served in a tiki glass with pineapple and cocktail umbrella...
A tiki cocktail drink
A glass of Bloody Mary garnished with celery, olives, salted rim and...
About us
When we opened Uahi Island Grill in September of 2007 our mission statement was simple: strive to serve delicious, fresh island flavors using wholesome, housemade products, local produce whenever possible, and take-out containers and utensils made from biocompostable plant fibers.
Our menu
Reviews
Start stop reviews carousel
Google reviews
five star review by
Sofia N:
We had a late lunch at this restaurant after swimming at Kailua bay. We tried the kailua pork fries appetizer, a sandwich, the ahi katsu cake, and a mix of pork and tuna. Everything was very tasty. We also tried some of their cocktails, alcoholic and non-alcoholic, all very good. The staff was also friendly and the atmosphere was nice. I recommend it!
Google reviews
five star review by
Natasha S:
We came here for lunch and it was such a great place! The drinks were delicious, the food was amazing, and our waitress was so friendly and helpful. I can't believe I've never been here before and I will be back.
Google reviews
five star review by
Stormie R:
Absolutely phenomenal food and drinks. The tajin tamarind drink was soooo good had to order two. Amazing flavor they go down so fast. Also the seared ahi salad recommended by the lovely bartender there was spot on and bursting with flavor.
Google reviews
five star review by
Susan R:
Looking for garlic shrimp after a day at the beach and this place came up on top. We came for the shrimp and added Guy Fiery picks of duck confit and garlic chicken. Everything was over the top great including the side green papaya salad, green salad and Kim chi.
Google reviews
five star review by
Janell C:
By far our favorite Hawaiian restaurant on the island! The Kalua pork is to die for, the irie chicken is also wonderful. You can't go wrong with anything really. Oh and their Mai tai is stellar too! We go at least once a month. Love it here!

About the Business
Welcome to Ki Club, Honolulu’s premier Japanese fusion restaurant experience! Experience a culinary journey where elevated dishes blend traditional Japanese flavors with innovative twists, all at approachable prices. Whether you’re indulging in a meal with friends or seeking an unforgettable night out, Ki Club transforms into an elevated nightclub on weekends, offering vibrant energy and a unique ambiance. Perfect for food enthusiasts and nightlife lovers alike, Ki Club brings you the best of both worlds—a dining experience and energetic nightlife, right in the heart of Honolulu.

Product collaborations
TOP PAGE
Menu
Main menu
Side dishes
Menu items limited to certain stores
Product collaborations
Main menu
Our soup is made from scratch at all
our restaurants in Japan and abroad.
We pay close attention to the ingredients
and preparation method.
Shio ramen
Mild salt flavor
Our specialty is the white tonkotsu soup which you can slurp until the last drop.
The red pickled plum on top hints the woman with red lipstick on, adding feminine touch to the ramen.
Enjoy a bowl of this ramen that stands out for its delicious taste, aroma and gentle flavor.
Shoyu ramen
Soy sauce flavor
This ramen's simple and somehow familiar flavor, which has a hint of fish, is quite popular.
By all means relish at least once our shoyu soup, which maximizes the delicious flavor of chau siu (roasted pork fillet) .
Miso ramen
Soybean paste flavor
For this ramen we blend akamiso into our tonkotsu soup.
This miso ramen that adds rich yet  mildness to our tonkotsu soup could become a habit if you try it just once.
Spicy miso ramen
Spicy soybean paste flavor
Our "spicy miso ramen" features three kinds of chili peppers added to a miso sauce based on a secret recipe.
We highly recommend this ramen, whose miso has rich yet sharpness that may be habit-forming.
Char siu ramen
Ramen with extra roast pork
This is a substantial bowl of ramen piled high with a precious amount of pork roasted to the point of falling apart.
Have any soup you like with Santouka's roasted pork, which allows you to enjoy the delicious flavor of meat.
Tokusen toroniku ramen
Ramen with roasted pork cheeks
This is Santouka's original dish.
The  plain ramen is eaten with pork cheek meat which is on a separate plate.
Get your fill of the softness of this cheek meat that instantly melts in your mouth.
Side dishes
Enjoy these items with your ramen.
※The following menu may not be available depending on the store.
Tokusen toroniku
Roasted pork cheeks
This is a precious, signature Santouka dish made using precious cheek meat, only 200-300 grams of which is found in a single pig.
We are proud of its texture which melts in your mouth.
Negimeshi
Rice with Green Onion
This is Santouka's well-known dish, hot white rice topped with katsuobushi, nori and diced green onions. Mix well before eating.
Hanjuku tamago
Soft-boiled egg
A soft-boiled egg is a standard ramen topping.
Enjoy its viscous texture.
Yaki gyoza
Fried dumpling
These juicy yet fried-to-a-crisp dumpling go perfectly with ramen.
Menu items limited to certain stores
Introducing limited-availability menu items
from each store.
Product collaborations
Here we introduce some products created under
the supervision of Hokkaido Ramen Santouka.
We have products on the homepage which have finished production.

potato.

eggs. Served with rice, cucumbers, shredded lettuce, carrot and
daikon pickle

Chinese Food
Chinese Food with Moonga Asian Bistro
At Moonga Asian Bistro, we are passionate about bringing you the best
Chinese food
that will tantalize your taste buds. Our team of professionals is highly trained and experienced in creating authentic dishes that are full of flavor. Moonga Asian Bistro uses only the freshest ingredients to ensure that every dish is packed with flavor and nutrition. Our team is dedicated to providing you with an exceptional dining experience, from the moment you walk into our
Asian restaurant
to the last bite of your meal. Whether you're in the mood for a comforting bowl of wonton soup or craving the bold flavors of kung pao beef stir-fry, you have a delightful array of options to choose from. Every dish is prepared with care and attention to detail, ensuring that you get the best possible meal every time. Come visit Moonga Asian Bistro today in Kaneohe, HI to try our delicious
Asian food
!

CATERING
Please click the Catering Menu button to view our extensive selection.  For your convenience, we listed the amount of servings per pan size on our menu.
When you're ready to place an order, or if you have any questions, call the
location
from which you would like to pick up your food and let us cook for you!
Catering Menu
Take Out Menu
WANNA MANAPUA?
ORIGINAL CHAR SIU: $2.65
BAKED
Perfecting our Chun family recipe for our Baked Manapua bread took us 10 years and is a treasured secret.  We are also proud of our char siu filling, which we cook at high heat to add a bit of char and a unique flavor that can only come from a wok.  Our Baked Manapua helped to put us on the map and continues to be an island favorite.
STEAMED
Steamed Manapua lovers argue that this product is better than our Baked Manapua.  Probably because our pillowy soft steamed bread rivals that of our baked bread.  Try one of each and you be the judge!
$
2.25
MINI STEAMED CHAR SIU
Our popular char siu filling is also available in a mini size!
$
2.25
MINI STEAMED ASSORTED FILLINGS: $2.25
Perfect for kids, large gatherings, or simply as quick bites on the go, these little guys satisfy big cravings!
PIZZA
One of our original assorted fillings, this manapua is filled with stringy mozzarella cheese, pepperoni, and made-from-scratch tomato sauce.
SPICY PORK
We marinate our pork in a fiery Szechuan sauce and combine it with wok seared shiitake mushrooms and chilis to give you something with a little more pep!
CURRY CHICKEN
This filling started off as a monthly special but was so popular we added it to our permanent menu.  We use premium Japanese curry and fresh herbs to give this filling its bold flavor.
AZUKI BEAN
Red azuki beans have been an island favorite for all sorts of sweet treats.  Try it in our manapua for something different!
LUP CHEONG
A classic Chinese sausage rolled in a fresh bun that is steamed until fluffy soft.
Garlic Chicken
This one's a little bit sweet and a little bit savory, with just the right amount of garlic, making this flavor  popular for years.
BAKED HOT DOG MANAPUA: $2.65
We never settle for anything less than the best, which is why we only use 100% beef hot dogs.
PLATE LUNCHES
$
14
PLATE LUNCH
This plate comes with up to two choices of starch and two choices of entrees.
$
14
$
10.50
BOWL
For those of you who can't handle the bigger Plate Lunch, the Bowl is perfect.  You can choose one starch and one entree choice!
$
10.50
DIM SUM & THEN SOME
$
1.35
PORK HASH
One of our most popular menu items, Chun Wah pork hash is a generous serving of our one-of-a-kind pork filling covered in a wrapper that we make from scratch.
$
1.35
$
1.70
HALF MOON
This classic Chinese dim sum item combines daikon, minced charisiu, dried shrimp, and seasonings in a steamed chewy wrapper.
$
1.70
$
1.80
CRISPY KAU GEE
Big, crispy, crunchy, and stuffed with our signature pork filling.  An absolute customer favorite, Chun Wah kau gee is a cut above the rest.
$
1.80
$
10 per dozen
PLAIN BAO BUNS
You can stuff these with literally anything you want for a quick meal.  Here's our pro-tip, try dipping the plain buns in some sweetened condensed milk.  You're welcome.
$
10 per dozen
$
2.75
RICE CAKE
Available in white or 9-layer varieties, these desserts have been popular since back back back in the day.
$
2.75
$
2.60
CUSTARD TARTS
The flaky crust on our tarts takes more effort to make but we think they're worth the time.  The custard is sweet and creamy without being too rich.  We have these available on Fridays, Saturdays, and Sundays, but be sure to call ahead to check availability.
$
2.60
$
1.70 ea
                  
                    /
$
13 bag of eight
TEA COOKIES
We mean it when we say that the aptly named tea cookies go perfectly with a hot cup of tea or your morning coffee.
$
1.70 ea
                  
                    /
$
13 bag of eight
$
1.70 ea
                  
                    /
$
13 bag of eight
ALMOND COOKIES
We use the same recipe that our family has used to make these cookies for years.  They have quickly become a customer favorite!
$
1.70 ea

13 bag of eight

BY THE POUND

CHAR SIU
Our char siu is cooked with meticulous attention to ensure the meat is both sweet and savory with a bit of char to make it irresistible.

4 Course Tasting

BRUNCH BUFFET
CONTACT
GALLERY
Daily Menus
Four exclusive seasonal Table d’Hote menus are available:
The Grand Tasting
A seven course curated journey through Hawaii’s farms, fields and fisheries, leading to the discovery of a true sense of place.
Four Course Tasting
With several menu options for each course - diners may map out their own itinerary with the thoughtful guidance of our expert service staff.
To enhance the experience - a focused collection of specially selected iconic and artisanal wines, local and global hand-crafted spirits, aperitif and digestif.
Ala Carte
Hoku's, renowned for its exquisite tasting menus, now offers an enticing à la carte menu featuring fresh, locally-sourced ingredients in dishes like the Auction Seafood Tower and Misoyaki Butterfish, allowing guests to customize their own culinary journey.
Make a Reservation
© Hoku’s at The Kahala Hotel & Resort 2025. All rights reserved.

APPETIZERS
BLACKENED AHI
Fresh Island tuna caught in Hawaiian waters seared on the outside while remaining rare on the inside.
AHI POKE
A Hawaiian delicacy made with fresh island tuna and marinated with onions, sesame oil, soy sauce and local spices.
Blackened Ahi
SHRIMP
Grilled to perfection and flambéed at your table.
SCALLOP
Sautéed in butter and lemon on your teppan grill.
BEEF TATAKI
Lightly seared, marinated, and thinly sliced served on a bed of onions with ponzu sauce.
ENTRÉES
The following is a wide assortment of entrees for you to choose from. All of our entrées are accompanied with
Crisp Tossed Green Salad, Grilled Shrimp Appetizer, Teppanyaki Vegetables, Steamed Rice, Pickled Vegetables, Miso Soup, Japanese Green Tea, and Dessert.
KOTOBUKI*
Deep Sea Gourmet Lobster, Scallops, Selected Filet Mignon, and Poke or Blackened Ahi.
UTAGE*
Deep Sea Gourmet Lobster & Selected Filet Mignon.
SHOGUN SPECIAL*
A combination of Certified Angus Beef Tenderloin, whole Lobster Tail, and tender Deep Sea Scallops.
DAIMYO*
Petite Filet, Lobster Tail, and Scallops.
WAGYU*
High-grade premium Wagyu Sirloin, naturally succulent, tender, and abundantly flavorful. 8-ounce center cut.
TANAKA SIRLOIN (8oz)
Certified Angus Beef center cut grilled to perfection.
* Premium Set Menu
SUPER SIZE TANAKA SIRLOIN (10oz)
Premium Certified Angus Beef center cut grilled to perfection.
RIBEYE STEAK (8oz)
Certified Angus Beef Ribeye, juicy and incredibly tender.
SUPER SIZE RIBEYE STEAK (10oz)
For the steak lover. Our largest cut of Certified Angus Beef Ribeye.
FILET (7oz)
Certified Angus Beef, center cut Tenderloin.
SUPER SIZE FILET (10oz)
A super-size cut of Certified Angus Beef Tenderloin.
STEAK AND TERIYAKI CHICKEN
Certified Angus Beef Sirloin, and Chicken grilled and glazed with Tanaka’s teriyaki sauce.
SUPER STEAK AND TERIYAKI CHICKEN
A super-size cut of Certified Angus Beef Sirloin and Chicken grilled and glazed with teriyaki sauce.
CHICKEN TERIYAKI
Grilled and glazed with Tanaka’s special teriyaki sauce.
LOBSTER AND SIRLOIN
Lobster Tail & Certified Angus Beef Sirloin.
SHRIMP
Sautéed and flambéed for added flavor.
SCALLOPS
Sautéed in butter and lemon.
MATSU
Certified Angus Beef Sirloin, Chicken, and Lobster Tail.
SEAFOOD COMBINATION
Lobster Tail, Salmon, and Scallops.
LOBSTER
Large Lobster Tail grilled and served in the shell.
SALMON
Grilled with a light touch of butter.
VEGETARIAN
Tasty Tofu Steak with Teppanyaki Vegetables.

About the Business
Welcome to The HALL by Beer Lab HI

The first concept focused not only on great Beer Lab HI beer, but on great food... The HALL was created to be a gathering place for the surrounding community and visitors alike. The open space concept and community tables encourage comradery and conversation. A gathering place for all.

The HALL by Beer Lab HI features a full menu serving breakfast, lunch, and dinner. 

Breakfast is focused on community. An array of dishes from french toast & loco moco to mimosas & coffee; A relaxed environment for a great morning.

Lunch/Dinner is about sharing - larger portions of food and sharing a great time over beer and cocktails.

And as always, a variety of 10 of the freshest locally produced beer straight from the brewery. Grab a crowler, or fill your growler when you stop by for a visit!
…
Read more
Ask the Community
Ask a question
Q:
Where exactly is this place in the mall? We have someone in a wheelchair so I like to know exactly where we're going and where is easiest to park. Thanks!
A:
It's on the Macy's side of the Mall, but on the Ross/TJ Maxx end. It's also ground level with an entrance facing the parking lot and one in the mall itself. With a wheelchair, I'd suggest entering through the mall. There are designated stalls for…
more
Kawika S.
4 people found this helpful
See 1 more answer
Q:
Do you have to order beer or can you just order food?
A:
We've gone several times just for food. We drink non-alcoholic beverages like their cream sodas or just have water. It's not a requirement to buy beer. Similar to Shirokiya's former beer garden and Yard House, there is no requirement to drink…
more
Christina N.

APPETIZERS
BLACKENED AHI
Fresh Island tuna caught in Hawaiian waters seared on the outside while remaining rare on the inside.
AHI POKE
A Hawaiian delicacy made with fresh island tuna and marinated with onions, sesame oil, soy sauce and local spices.
Blackened Ahi
SHRIMP
Grilled to perfection and flambéed at your table.
SCALLOP
Sautéed in butter and lemon on your teppan grill.
BEEF TATAKI
Lightly seared, marinated, and thinly sliced served on a bed of onions with ponzu sauce.
ENTRÉES
The following is a wide assortment of entrees for you to choose from. All of our entrées are accompanied with
Crisp Tossed Green Salad, Grilled Shrimp Appetizer, Teppanyaki Vegetables, Steamed Rice, Pickled Vegetables, Miso Soup, Japanese Green Tea, and Dessert.
KOTOBUKI*
Deep Sea Gourmet Lobster, Scallops, Selected Filet Mignon, and Poke or Blackened Ahi.
UTAGE*
Deep Sea Gourmet Lobster & Selected Filet Mignon.
SHOGUN SPECIAL*
A combination of Certified Angus Beef Tenderloin, whole Lobster Tail, and tender Deep Sea Scallops.
DAIMYO*
Petite Filet, Lobster Tail, and Scallops.
WAGYU*
High-grade premium Wagyu Sirloin, naturally succulent, tender, and abundantly flavorful. 8-ounce center cut.
TANAKA SIRLOIN (8oz)
Certified Angus Beef center cut grilled to perfection.
* Premium Set Menu

1001 Waimanu Street, Honolulu, HI 96814
About us
Delicious, Home-Made Baked Goods
Our passion has always been to deliver delicious, home-made baked goods to the local people. We started our small business with just a few items at the Aloha Stadium and farmer’s markets.
Read more
about us
signature drinks
Freshly Brewed With The Finest Beans
We offer a variety of food and signature drinks. Our espresso beans are imported from Italy and the coffee used for our house coffee is freshly roasted weekly on the North Shore of Oahu.
drinks
home-made
Peanut Butter
We create our home-made peanut butter inhouse in small batches. They are very popular as souvenirs and gifts. We use natural macadamia nuts from the Big Island. The four flavors include Honey Macadamia nut, Coconut, Waialua Coffee, and Banana.

slideshow start stop playing
Reviews
Review by - Yelp
Tommy L:
I love this place, a feeling of old Hawaii. Loved my blueberry scone, aloha cold brew coffee and the acai bowl. My son lives down the street and plans to return. I live on the mainland but will definitely return on my next visit. I would highly recommend Aloha Bakehouse and cafe.
Review by - Yelp
Tri An V:
This place is a great find! Overall, the service, variety of drinks and food items, and ambiance is great!
Review by - Yelp
Saena T:
Cant wait to visit Hawaii and stop by here to get my house coffee and baked bread with meat in it! So yummy!!
Review by - Yelp
Di C:
The absolute best scone I have ever had- Pineapple honey scone was so so good I went 2 days in a row. The coffee was fantastic as well...
Review by - Yelp
Stephanie G:
Great little find in Kaka'ako for breakfast and lunch. Had a latte and chocolate chip scone and brought the rest of the office each one of their scones. Everyone enjoyed them and thought they were delicious. Definitely will be back to try other things! Convenient bc they're open early!

Menu
Burgers
All burgers come on Chubbies’ house recipe potato bun, baked fresh locally. Premium fresh beef from Creekstone Farms. Lettuce wrap (no bun) available on request.
O.P. Style
onions and pickles, now with house-made spicy pickles
smashed beef patty, american cheese, grilled onions, house-made hot pickles, garlic-sesame aioli
Carolina Onion
our take on the Oklahoma onion burger
smashed beef patty, cheddar cheese, thin-sliced griddled onions, house-made pickles, carolina dijonnaise
The 1950
the bad boy version of a Chubbies’ classic
smashed beef patty, american cheese, house-made red onion relish, shredded lettuce, tomato, 1950 sauce
Cheeseburger
plain cheeseburger = meat, cheese, bun
smashed beef patty, american cheese
*We offer limited modifications or add-ons to cheeseburgers
Fries
We use only 100% trans-fat free, highly sustainable rice bran oil
Fries
chubbies signature crinkle cut, always crispy, medium-sized order
Sauce
carolina dijonnaise, garlic-sesame aioli, 1950 sauce
Spicy Garlic Fries
spicy nashville sauce, fresh garlic, garlic-sesame aioli, chives
Cali Fries
american cheese, grilled onion, 1950 sauce, diced pickles & relish
Ice Cream
We use only premium liquid milk soft serve from Honey Hill Farms. No powder mix!

our premium vanilla custard, cup or cone

mexican coke, IBC root beer, local Zingipop sodas, and more available in fridge

WE ARE THE AMERICAN STEAKHOUSE
We've been mastering our craft since 1964, so you could say we know a thing or two. Our cuts are aged at least 21 days, seasoned to excellence, expertly flame-grilled and served up just the way you like it. You've earned it. Whether you're here to throw back a couple with old friends or trying to finish off the Campfire Feast on your own, there's always a seat for you. We're here to share in all your most memorable experiences.

CUISINES OF HAWAII FOR 2
Celebrate the cultural diversity of the islands through our island cuisine. We invite you to explore the history of Hawaii and embrace the Ohana style dining of sharing and celebrating. Takeout

From bao buns and poke to fresh bowls and noodles, our menu celebrates all the good things we love about eating and sharing food in Hawaii. Handcrafted with local flavors, our beverage menu has something for everyone. (P.S. – our Mango soft serve can’t be missed!)
MENUS
Breakfast
Lunch + Dinner
Dessert
Keiki
Happy Hour
Join us from 2 pm – 6 pm daily for cocktails, draft beers, wines, and delicious grinds.
Happy Hour
make a reservation
ABOUT US
CONCEPT
Piko is a local style hangout where you can sit back, relax and enjoy pau hana. In reference to its meaning, “the center where life begins,” Piko brings to life the food, lifestyle and aloha we know and love in Hawaii. Think shared plates of garlic noodles, mochiko chicken, dynamite fries and bao buns in a place you won’t want to leave.
CHEFS
Chef de Cuisine Adam Kamahele has developed a creative menu that draws upon his local roots and experience as head chef at Kalapawai Cafe and executive chef of Gordon Biersch Honolulu. He has been guided and supported by our corporate food and beverage team led by Chief Food Officer and Corporate Chef Keoni Chang, Chefs Rebekah DeCosta and Nick Miguel and Corporate Mixologist, Hailey Berkey. Piko is a passion project for our team, as it brings to life the flavors and spirit of the food and drink they love.
SPACE
Located on the first floor of Lilia Waikiki, below Waikiki Market, our space reflects Hawaii’s warm, easy-going lifestyle and our connection to both the mountains and the sea.
STAY IN TOUCH
Hours
7 am - 10 pm daily

Honolulu, HI 96815

name: La Mariana Sailing Club
address: 50 Sand Island Access Rd, Honolulu, HI 96819
raw_text:
La Mariana Sailing Club Menu (update September 2025)
Skip to content
La Mariana Sailing Club
HOME
About
Menu
Reservations
Photos
La Mariana Sailing Club’s Menu
The menu was updated on August 2023
For more details about upcoming changes, contact the restaurant hotline at
+1 808 848 2800
The Essence of Freshness
La Mariana Sailing Club takes pride in the vibrant and authentic flavors that define its cuisine. At the heart of this culinary journey is a commitment to the freshest of ingredients. Each dish is a reflection of the lush and abundant offerings of the Hawaiian islands, where local produce and ocean-fresh seafood are celebrated. Whether it’s the zesty Ahi Poke, the tender Kalua Pork, or the savory Lumpia, every bite carries the essence of the Pacific.
The commitment to freshness extends to the bar, where classic tiki cocktails such as Mai Tais and Blue Hawaiians are expertly crafted with the finest ingredients. At La Mariana, the experience goes beyond a meal; it becomes a celebration of the bountiful gifts of the Hawaiian land and sea, a journey that tantalizes the taste buds and transports guests to a tropical paradise with every sip and bite.
Food for Health at La Mariana Sailing Club
At La Mariana Sailing Club, the commitment to well-being is as paramount as the exceptional dining experience. Health and safety are of utmost importance, and this dedication extends to the food served at the club. The culinary team at La Mariana places a strong emphasis on safety protocols, ensuring that all food is prepared, handled, and served in accordance with the highest industry standards.
From the freshest ingredients to rigorous hygiene practices, every detail is considered to provide an experience that not only tantalizes the taste buds but also brings peace of mind. With a focus on the quality of ingredients, the preparation process, and impeccable food handling, La Mariana Sailing Club is committed to safeguarding health while serving delicious Hawaiian and American cuisine that defines this Polynesian paradise. The dining experience at La Mariana is not only delightful but also dedicated to ensuring safety and well-being.
A World of Flavor
La Mariana Sailing Club beckons diners to explore a world of diverse and delectable culinary experiences. The menu at this Polynesian paradise is a treasure trove of flavors, offering a rich tapestry of dishes and drinks that cater to every palate. From classic Hawaiian delicacies like Ahi Poke and Kalua Pork to American favorites like Loco Moco, the options are as diverse as the island’s landscapes. The bar is a realm of enchanting tiki cocktails, with Mai Tais and Blue Hawaiians transporting guests to a tropical oasis sip by sip.
Whether in the mood for a flavorful adventure or seeking familiar comfort, La Mariana Sailing Club’s menu is a culinary voyage that leaves no craving unfulfilled. Every bite and every sip serve as an invitation to savor the essence of the Pacific, where the fusion of flavors mirrors the rich tapestry of Hawaii itself.
