ALOHA
Experience our
mixed-plate
of flavors
Located inside Waikiki Market, ʻOlili serves contemporary cuisine rooted in the traditions of Hawaii. Our food and drinks are inspired by the culturally diverse tastes we know and love.
Make a reservation
ALOHA
Our Menus
Celebrate Hawaii’s “mixed plate” of rich, diverse flavors and how food brings us together.
Dinner
Dessert
Wine
Happy Hour
Available 4 pm - 6 pm, daily.
Concept
ʻOlili is a restaurant that serves contemporary cuisine rooted in the local traditions of Hawaii, while honoring the history of Waikiki - from its natural landscape to a bustling global destination. Our food and drinks, which celebrate the mixed-plate of flavors familiar in Hawaii, are driven by our passion for creativity and a modern interpretation of the dishes we love.
Space
Located inside Waikiki Market, ʻOlili  overlooks the streets of Waikiki. Our space represents our name, which means “sparkling, shimmering, shining” and is inspired by the buzzing energy of Waikiki.
Our Mission
Our mission is to provide guests with an authentic Hawaii experience through dishes and drinks that creatively and respectfully reference our local roots. We celebrate Hawaii’s mixed plate of rich, diverse flavors and share how food brings us together in a lively but relaxed gathering place overlooking the streets of Waikiki.

PROFILE
Hitoshi
He has acquired his culinary knowledge and experiences through acclaimed restaurants for the past 25 years in New York City such as the Four Season Restaurant, Sea Grill at the Rockefeller Center, the Plaza Hotel, Jean Georges, the Harmonie Club, and the Pierre Hotel. As the saucier, he was in charge of making stocks, sauces and soups for the entire Food Division of the hotel. He was also a Banquet Chef and in charge of preparing the food for 500 to 1000 people. Hitoshi joined morimoto New York and was in charge of the Chefâs Choice, multi course tasting menu and developed creative and original cuisine for 4 years. He was sent to Honolulu to open morimoto Waikiki as a sous chef in 2009. Hitoshi and Mieko made a fresh new start and opened, OEC CafÃ© in downtown Honolulu in July of 2013.
ãã¥ã¼ã»ã¨ã¼ã¯ã§ã®ï¼ï¼å¹´éãthe Four Season Restaurant, Sea Grill at the Rockfeller Center, the Plaza Hotel, Jean Georges, the Harmonie Club, and the Pierre Hotel ãªã©ãèåãªã¬ã¹ãã©ã³ãããã«ã§Chef de cuisineã¨ãã¦èããµãã£ãä»ãï¼ï¼ï¼äººããï¼ï¼ï¼ï¼äººã®ãã¼ãã£ã¼æçãä½ãBanquet Chefã¨ãã¦ãæ´»èºãããã«ã§ã¯ãsaucier ã¨ãã¦ããã®ããã«å¨ä½ã§ä½¿ç¨ããããã¹ããã¯ãã½ã¼ã¹ãã¹ã¼ããä½ããã¨ãä»»ããããããã®å¾ãï½ï½ï½ï½ï½ï½ï½ï½ ï¼®ï¼¹ã«ã¦ãããã¾ããæçãã®ã·ã§ãã¨ãã¦ï¼å¹´éãæ§ããªåµä½æçãåµããããã ï¼ï¼ï¼ï¼å¹´ãmorimotoãã¯ã¤ã­ã­ã§ãªã¼ãã³ããã«å½ãããããã«ã«ã¸ç§»ãããããã¦ãï¼ï¼ï¼ï¼å¹´ã ï¼æã«ã¯ãOEC CafeãMiekoã¨å±ã«ããã«ã«ã®ãã¦ã³ã»ã¿ã¦ã³ã«ãªã¼ãã³ããã
Mieko
After graduating from a premier culinary college, the Culinary Institute of America in New York , she has worked as a chef at Susanna Foo in Philadelphia, Stanhope Park Hyatt in NYC, and Park Hyatt Vendome in Paris, France. When she returned to the US, she worked as the Head Chef at a fusion restaurant in New Jersey. She was in charge of not only the kitchen but also their dessert. She also created the special menu for sake or wine tasting events there as well. Later she joined morimoto in NYC worked with Hitoshi as a sous chef. She came to Honolulu to open morimoto here in Honolulu with Hitoshi.

NALU HEALTH BAR MENU
Check out our breakfast, lunch and dinner options!
Our menu allows customers to experience the vibrant, fresh flavors of Hawaii, such as ahi and local fruits, as well as South American inspired dishes and ingredients such as açaí and our Nalu sauce!
Using fresh, organic and local ingredients as much as possible, we aim to work with local food producers and support local farmers so our customers can have the healthiest and tastiest options available.
Vegetarian? Look for the V next to food items to see our vegetarian options! Gluten-free? Swap your bread or wrap for our locally made GF bread by My Fit Bread or try one of our gluten-free, vegan baked goods by Ulu and Kalo Bakery. Don’t forget to check out our other grab-n-go items when you come in!
Visit us for a dine in option, or take it to-go! Each of our four locations provides an option for outdoor seating, which is pet friendly, so bring your furry friend along!

NAD+ for Anti-Aging 300mg, 500mg, 1000mg
Ingredients:
Normal Saline 0.9% IV fluid, Electrolytes, NAD+ (Nicotinamide Adenine Dinucleotide), B-complex (B1, B2, B3, B5, B6), Hydroxocobalamin (B-12), Ascorbic Acid (Vitamin C), Magnesium Chloride, Calcium Chloride, Glutathione
Key Ingredients and Their Benefits
Priming cells with specific ingredients in NAD+ IV therapy infusion enhances the effectiveness of NAD+ by creating an optimal environment for cellular function and repair. Each ingredient plays a crucial role:
NAD+:
(Nicotinamide Adenine Dinucleotide) As a key player in energy metabolism in every cell of the body, NAD+ helps power cellular processes and promotes mitochondrial function, which is essential for energy production, overall vitality, as well as in various biological processes, including DNA repair and regulation of cellular functions.
Calcium:
By supporting muscle function and nerve signaling, calcium helps ensure that cells communicate effectively and operate optimally, enhancing the overall efficacy of the infusion.
Magnesium:
This mineral is critical for many enzymatic reactions, including those involved in energy production and DNA repair. Magnesium helps reduce stress on cells and supports metabolic processes, allowing NAD+ to work more efficiently.
Vitamin C:
As a powerful antioxidant, Vitamin C protects cells from oxidative stress, which can hinder cellular function and longevity. By neutralizing free radicals, it allows NAD+ to perform its functions without interruption.
B-Complex Vitamins:
These vitamins support energy metabolism and enhance mood, ensuring that cells have the nutrients needed for efficient energy production and overall health, making them more responsive to the effects of NAD+.
Vitamin B-12:
This vitamin is vital for red blood cell formation and neurological health, ensuring that cells receive adequate oxygen and support for optimal function, further amplifying the benefits of NAD+.
Glutathione:
As the body's master antioxidant, glutathione assists in detoxification and reduces inflammation. By protecting cells from damage, it creates a favorable environment for NAD+ to enhance cellular repair and longevity.
By priming cells with these essential ingredients, NAD+ IV therapy can more effectively support energy production, cellular repair, and overall health, promoting longevity and vitality. This synergistic approach enhances the therapeutic effects of NAD+, ensuring that cells are not only energized but also resilient against the stresses of aging and environmental factors.
NAD+ for Anti-Aging 300mg, 500mg, 1000mg

ORGINIAL MYER’S COCTAIL
Ingredients:
Normal Saline 0.9% IV fluid, Electrolytes, B-complex (B1, B2, B3, B5, B6), Hydroxocobalamin (B-12), Ascorbic Acid (Vitamin C), Magnesium Chloride, Calcium Chloride
Key Ingredients and Their Benefits for Classic Myer's Cocktail
Calcium:
Essential for strong bones and teeth, calcium also supports muscle function and nerve transmission, helping maintain overall bodily functions.
Magnesium:
This mineral promotes muscle relaxation, reduces stress, and improves sleep quality, contributing to overall well-being and recovery.
Vitamin C:
A powerful antioxidant, Vitamin C enhances immune function, supports collagen production for healthy skin, and helps protect the body from oxidative stress.
B-Complex Vitamins:
These vitamins are crucial for energy metabolism, support brain health, and help improve mood, reducing fatigue and promoting vitality.
Vitamin B-12:
Vital for red blood cell formation and neurological function, B-12 boosts energy levels and supports cognitive health, making it essential for overall vitality.
ATHLETIC RECOVERY IV: Optimal Performance x Recovery
Ingredients:
Normal Saline 0.9% IV fluid, Electrolytes, B-complex (B1, B2, B3, B5, B6), Hydroxocobalamin (B-12), Amino Acids, Zinc, Magnesium, Taurine, Glutathione
Key Ingredients and their Benefits:
Amino Acid Blend-
Amino acids are the building blocks of proteins, crucial for muscle repair and growth. They help reduce muscle soreness and promote faster recovery after intense workouts.
Magnesium Chloride-
Magnesium plays a vital role in muscle function, energy production, and reducing cramps. It helps maintain electrolyte balance, promoting overall hydration and muscle relaxation.
B-Complex Vitamins-
B vitamins are essential for energy metabolism, helping convert food into fuel. They support overall endurance and reduce fatigue during workouts, enhancing athletic performance.
Hydroxocobalamin (Vitamin B-12)-
This form of Vitamin B-12 is key for red blood cell production and oxygen transport. Adequate levels improve energy levels and focus, crucial for peak performance.
Taurine-
Taurine supports cardiovascular health and muscle function. It has antioxidant properties and can help reduce muscle damage during intense exercise, aiding recovery.
Zinc-
Zinc is vital for immune function and muscle repair. It supports recovery from exercise-induced stress and helps maintain optimal hormone levels for performance.
Glutathione-
As a powerful antioxidant, glutathione helps combat oxidative stress caused by intense workouts. It promotes faster recovery and enhances overall immune function.
WEIGHT LOSS IV & LIGHT DETOX
Ingredients:
Normal Saline 0.9% IV fluid, Electrolytes, B-complex (B1, B2, B3, B5, B6), Ascorbic Acid (Vitamin C), Hydroxocobalamin (B-12), L-Carnitine, L-Arginine, Zinc, Glutathione
Key Ingredients and Their Benefits:
Vitamin B-Complex:
These vitamins play a crucial role in energy metabolism and help convert food into energy, supporting a healthy metabolism and reducing fatigue during weight loss.
L-Carnitine:
This amino acid is essential for transporting fatty acids into the mitochondria for energy production, helping to enhance fat burning and improve exercise performance.
L-Arginine:
L-Arginine supports fat metabolism by helping the body break down fats for energy, while also promoting muscle growth to preserve lean muscle mass during fat loss. Additionally, it enhances hormone regulation and supports the release of growth hormone, further aiding in fat loss.
Vitamin B-12:
Vital for energy production and the metabolism of fats and carbohydrates, B-12 supports overall vitality and can help reduce feelings of fatigue during weight loss efforts.
Zinc:
Important for regulating metabolism and supporting appetite control, zinc helps optimize metabolic function and can enhance overall weight management.
Vitamin C:
As a powerful antioxidant, Vitamin C supports the immune system and reduces oxidative stress, which can be beneficial during weight loss and overall wellness.
Glutathione:
Known as the body's master antioxidant, glutathione supports detoxification and reduces inflammation, promoting a healthier metabolism and aiding in weight loss.
LONGIVITY IV  Anti-Aging & Healing
Ingredients:
Normal Saline 0.9% IV fluid, Electrolytes, B-complex (B1, B2, B3, B5, B6), Ascorbic Acid (Vitamin C), Vitamin D, Magnesium Chloride, Selenium, Coenzyme Q10, Zinc, Glutathione
Key Ingredients and Their Benefits:
Vitamin C:
A potent antioxidant, Vitamin C helps protect cells from oxidative damage, supports collagen production for skin health, and boosts the immune system, all of which contribute to healthy aging.
Vitamin D:
Essential for bone health and immune function, Vitamin D plays a crucial role in reducing inflammation and supporting overall well-being as we age.
B-Complex Vitamins:
These vitamins support energy metabolism, promote brain health, and enhance mood, helping to maintain cognitive function and vitality throughout life.
Magnesium:
Important for over 300 biochemical reactions in the body, magnesium supports muscle and nerve function, promotes heart health, and helps reduce the risk of chronic diseases.
Zinc:
This mineral is vital for immune function and DNA synthesis, supporting cellular repair and overall health, which is essential for longevity.
Selenium:
An antioxidant that helps protect cells from damage, selenium supports thyroid function and immune health, playing a key role in promoting longevity.
Coenzyme Q10:
This powerful antioxidant supports energy production in cells and helps protect against oxidative stress, contributing to heart health and overall vitality.
Glutathione:
Known as the body’s master antioxidant, glutathione aids in detoxification, reduces inflammation, and protects against cellular damage, promoting overall health and longevity.
HANGOVER IV: Hydration & Recovery
Ingredients:
Normal Saline 0.9% IV fluid, Electrolytes, B-complex (B1, B2, B3, B5, B6), Hydroxocobalamin (B-12), Magnesium, Pepcid (option), Zofran (option), Toradol (option), Sodium Bicarbonate (option), Glutathione push (recommended)
Key Ingredients and their Benefits in our Infusion:
B-Complex Vitamins-
These vitamins are crucial for energy metabolism and help reduce fatigue and irritability, improving your overall mood and cognitive function.
Vitamin B-12-
Hydroxocobalamin supports red blood cell production and energy levels, aiding in mental clarity and combating the sluggishness often felt during a hangover.
Magnesium Chloride-
Magnesium helps alleviate headaches and muscle tension, common hangover symptoms. It also aids in rehydration and restores electrolyte balance.
Pepcid (option)-
This medication can help reduce stomach discomfort and nausea by blocking acid production, making it easier to settle your stomach after drinking.
Zofran (option)-
Zofran is effective in preventing nausea and vomiting, providing relief from gastrointestinal distress often associated with hangovers.
Toradol (option)-
An anti-inflammatory medication, Toradol helps reduce pain and discomfort, providing quick relief from headaches and body aches.
Glutathione (Push Recommended)
As a potent antioxidant, glutathione aids in detoxifying the liver and clearing out toxins from alcohol consumption. It significantly enhances recovery speed and overall well-being.
    Want to go all Natural? Substitute all medications and replace with sodium bicarbonate. Naturally helps to regulate pH levels in the stomach, providing relief from heartburn and acid reflux.
GLAMOUR & BEAUTY IV Collagen x Hair, Skin, & Nails
Ingredients:
Normal Saline 0.9% IV fluid, Electrolytes, Lysine, Ascorbic Acid (Vitamin C), Biotin, B-complex (B1, B2, B3, B5, B6), Glutathione
Key Ingredients & their Benefits:
Lysine:
Supports collagen synthesis and strengthens tissues.
Ascorbic Acid (Vitamin C):
Boosts collagen production and promotes skin elasticity.
Biotin:
Essential for healthy hair, skin, and nails.
Vita Complex (B1, B2, B3, B5, B6):
Provides energy, enhances skin health, and supports overall wellness.
Hydroxocobalamin (Vitamin B-12):
This form of Vitamin B-12 is key for red blood cell production and oxygen transport. Adequate levels improve energy levels and focus, crucial for peak performance.
Glutathione:
Powerful antioxidant that detoxifies and brightens skin.
SUPER IMMUNE BOOST IV Immune Boost x Wellness
Ingredients:
Normal Saline 0.9% IV fluid, Electrolytes, High Dose Ascorbic Acid (Vitamin C), B-complex (B1, B2, B3, B5, B6), Zinc, High dose Glutathione
Key Ingredients and their Benefits in our Infusion:
High Dose Ascorbic Acid (Vitamin C):
A potent antioxidant that supports immune function and helps fight off infections.
Zinc:
Essential for immune cell function and helps reduce the duration of colds.
High Dose Glutathione:
A powerful antioxidant that detoxifies the body and strengthens the immune response.
B-Complex Vitamins:
A blend of B1, B2, B3, B5, and B6 to support energy metabolism and overall wellness.
Hydroxocobalamin (Vitamin B-12):
This form of Vitamin B-12 is key for red blood cell production and oxygen transport. Adequate levels improve energy levels and focus, crucial for peak performance.
GUT HEALTH IV- Reduce bloating and discomfort
Ingredients:
Normal Saline 0.9% IV fluid, Electrolytes, B-complex (B1, B2, B3, B5, B6), Ascorbic Acid (Vitamin C), Magnesium Chloride, Zinc, L-Glutamine, sodium Bicarbonate.
Key Ingredients and Their Benefits:
L-Glutamine:
This amino acid is essential for maintaining the integrity of the intestinal lining and helps support gut healing, making it crucial for digestive health.
Vitamin C:
A potent antioxidant, Vitamin C aids in collagen production for gut lining repair and supports immune function, promoting a healthy gut environment.
Magnesium:
Important for digestive enzyme function and muscle relaxation, magnesium helps alleviate constipation and supports overall gut motility.
Zinc:
This mineral plays a vital role in maintaining gut barrier integrity and supports the immune system, helping to reduce inflammation and promote gut health.
Sodium Bicarbonate:
This ingredient helps balance stomach acidity, aiding digestion and promoting a healthier gut environment by neutralizing excess acid.
B-Complex Vitamins:
Essential for energy metabolism and neurotransmitter function, B vitamins support a healthy gut microbiome and enhance overall digestive health.
ENERGY BOOST- Super Charge your Metabolism
Ingredients:
Normal Saline 0.9% IV fluid, Electrolytes, B-Complex, Hydroxocobalamin (B-12), L-Carnitine, Amino Acid Blend
Key Ingredients and Their Benefits:
L-Carnitine:
This amino acid is essential for transporting fatty acids into the mitochondria for energy production, enhancing fat metabolism and providing a significant energy boost during workouts.
Vitamin B-12:
Vital for energy production, B-12 helps convert carbohydrates into glucose, which fuels your body and supports overall vitality, reducing feelings of fatigue.
Amino Acid Blend:
This blend supports muscle recovery and growth, enhances energy levels, and aids in metabolic function, making it ideal for improving performance and endurance.
Vita B Complex:
Includes B1 (Thiamine), B2 (Riboflavin), B3 (Niacinamide), B5 (Pantothenic acid), and B6 (Pyridoxine) to support energy metabolism and reduce fatigue.
JET LAG IV: Hydration & Energy
Ingredients:
Normal Saline 0.9% IV fluid, electrolytes, B-complex (B1, B2, B3, B5, B6), Hydroxocobalamin (B-12), Ascorbic Acid (Vitamin C), Magnesium Chloride, Zinc, Glutathione.
Key Ingredients & their Benefits:
Vitamin C:
This powerful antioxidant helps combat oxidative stress, boosts the immune system, and promotes overall recovery after travel, helping you feel revitalized.
B-Complex Vitamins:
Essential for energy production and mood regulation, B vitamins help alleviate fatigue and enhance cognitive function, making them vital for adjusting to new time zones.
Magnesium:
Known for its calming effects, magnesium helps reduce stress and muscle tension, promoting restful sleep and recovery during travel.
Zinc:
This mineral supports immune function and helps the body adapt to changes, making it crucial for maintaining health during travel.
Glutathione:
Often referred to as the body's master antioxidant, glutathione helps detoxify and reduce inflammation, promoting quicker recovery from the physical stress of travel.
Vitamin B-12:
Vital for energy metabolism and neurological function, B-12 supports alertness and reduces fatigue, helping you bounce back from jet lag.
BRAIN IV- Increase Cognitive Function
Ingredients:
Normal Saline 0.9% IV fluid, electrolytes, B-complex (B1, B2, B3, B5, B6), Hydroxocobalamin (B-12), Ascorbic Acid (Vitamin C), Coenzyme Q10, Magnesium Chloride, Zinc, Amino Acid Blend.
Key Ingredients and their Benefits:
Vitamin B-Complex:
Essential for energy production and neurotransmitter synthesis, B vitamins support cognitive function and enhance mood.
Hydroxocobalamin (Vitamin B-12):
This form of Vitamin B-12 is key for red blood cell production and oxygen transport. Adequate levels improve energy levels and focus, crucial for peak performance.
Vitamin C:
A powerful antioxidant, Vitamin C protects brain cells from oxidative stress and is vital for the synthesis of neurotransmitters, boosting overall brain health.
Coenzyme Q10:
This antioxidant plays a crucial role in energy production within brain cells and may help improve memory and cognitive performance.
Magnesium:
Important for nerve function and synaptic plasticity, magnesium helps reduce stress and anxiety while enhancing learning and memory.
Zinc:
Critical for neurotransmission and brain development, zinc supports cognitive function and helps protect against age-related decline.
Amino Acid Blend (Acetyl-L-Carnitine, L-Tyrosine, L-Arginine): This blend promotes energy production, enhances mental focus, and supports overall cognitive performance, making it ideal for brain health. L-Tyrosine is a precursor to important neurotransmitters like dopamine and norepinephrine. L-Arginine boosts nitric oxide production, improving blood flow (also improves symptoms of ED).
ALL ENCOMPASSING Mind x Body x Spirit
Ingredients:
Normal Saline 0.9% IV fluid, electrolytes, B-complex (B1, B2, B3, B5, B6), Hydroxocobalamin (B-12), Ascorbic Acid (Vitamin C), Magnesium Chloride, Zinc, Biotin, Amino Acid Blend, Glutathione
Key Ingredients and their Benefits:
Ascorbic Acid (Vitamin C):
A potent antioxidant that boosts immunity and promotes radiant skin.
Vita B Complex:
Includes B1 (Thiamine), B2 (Riboflavin), B3 (Niacinamide), B5 (Pantothenic acid), and B6 (Pyridoxine) to support energy metabolism and reduce fatigue.
Magnesium:
Essential for muscle function, energy production, and stress relief.
Zinc:
Vital for immune health and cellular repair.
Amino Acids:
The building blocks of protein that aid in muscle recovery and overall wellness.
Glutathione:
A powerful detoxifier that combats oxidative stress and enhances overall vitality.
Hydroxocobalamin (Vitamin B-12):
This form of Vitamin B-12 is key for red blood cell production and oxygen transport. Adequate levels improve energy levels and focus, crucial for peak performance.
Biotin:
Essential for healthy hair, skin, and nails.
Families are Forever
With plenty of onsite activities, The Kahala Hotel & Resort is the perfect island getaway for you and your keiki (children).
Day 1: Fun In The Sun
Soak up the warm Hawaiian sunshine at our outdoor pool and hot tub. Rent a cabana for
the day so you can lounge peacefully while the kids make a splash. With pool toys
available for purchase, they’ll never run out of things to do! When you get hungry, there’s
no need to go far. Enjoy a light meal at our poolside restaurant, Seaside Grill.
In the afternoon, get to know the playful Bottlenose Dolphins who live in our natural
water lagoon. This experience is fun for the whole family, and you’ll get to feed, play and
swim with these amazing creatures. Learn more about our partner, Dolphin Quest.
End the day with an oceanside dinner at Plumeria Beach House. Enjoy fresh
island-inspired cuisine as you watch the sun dip below the horizon.
Day 2: Explore Waikiki
In the morning, let the kids indulge their creativity at our weekly Hawaiian Culture
Classes, which include lei making, lauhala weaving and more.* View the calendar.
While they learn, why not treat yourself to a relaxing Couples Massage at the Kahala
Spa? We are proud to partner with Aloha Sitters to offer child-sitting services so you can
give yourself a much-deserved break. View spa services.
After a quick lunch at Plumeria Beach House, hop on our complimentary shuttle to the
Royal Hawaiian Center in Waikiki. From there, it’s a short walk to the Waikiki Aquarium
or Honolulu Zoo where your family can spend the afternoon marveling at the creatures of
the deep or meeting friendly beasts from around the world.
Head back to your room to freshen up and enjoy cocktails and dinner service at The
Veranda. Enjoy live music from local musicians every Thursday - Saturday from 6:00pm
- 9:00pm. Learn more.
*Activities are subject to change. Please see our events calendar for more information.
Day 3: Snorkel & Beach Adventure
Wake up bright and early to go snorkeling at the legendary Hanauma Bay. Please note
that reservations must be made in advance to enter the park.
Return home to spend a golden afternoon on the secluded beach in front of our hotel,
where the gentle waves are safe for all ages. For your convenience, we offer beach gear
including snorkels and fins, bodyboards, kayaks and paddle boards.
Create lasting memories with a sunset photo session on the beach. As a guest, you can
book a 45-minute photo shoot on our grounds with Pacific Dream Photography. Learn
more.
Afterward, tuck into a delicious meal at Arancino’s, voted Best Italian Restaurant in
Hawaii.
Sunset Sweethearts
The Kahala Hotel & Resort is a top destination for honeymoons and anniversaries. Celebrate
your love with a romantic retreat to paradise.
Day 1: Discover Kahala
Wake up to the relaxing Hawaiian tradewinds blowing through your suite and stunning
views of the mountains or sea.
Don’t let this luxury go to waste. Order our Grand Breakfast service delivered to your
door for one-of-a-kind breakfast in bed. View menu.
In the afternoon, rent a pair of our cruiser bikes to explore the beautiful neighborhood of
Kahala and soak in the gorgeous views. Stop by Kahala Mall to browse the stores and
recharge with a light meal or beverage, or see a movie.
Rest a while and freshen up, then change into your evening attire and make your way to
The Veranda, our open-air dining room. Visit Thursday - Saturday to sip delicious Mai
Tais while listening to live entertainment by Hawaii’s top local talent.
Day 2: Indulge Your Senses
On your second day, rent a car at our on-property car rental desk and head west for a
leisurely drive around Diamond Head. If it’s a Saturday, stop by the KCC Farmer’s
Market to sample fresh produce and browse handcrafted gifts. Afterward, continue on to
the eclectic neighborhood of Kaimuki, known for its vibrant art and food scene.
After returning for a short nap, head to the Kahala Spa for our signature Romance
Treatment, which includes a customized full-body massage, a deep soak tub with rose
petals and a soothing facial.
At sunset, head down to Hoku’s for a decadent four-course dinner. With views of the
ocean and a selection of wine fines, it’s the perfect place end a night a paradise.
Day 3: Lover’s Retreat
On your last morning, indulge in a late start to your day.
After brunch at Plumeria Beach House, head to the Honolulu Museum of Art for a guided
tour of Shangri La, a historic Islamic-inspired estate perched on Black Point.
Return back home to rest, or read a good book by the pool.
At golden hour, take a romantic walk on our stunning shoreline, hand-in-hand. Have your
cocktails hand-delivered from Seaside Grill as you enjoy happy hour on the beach.
For dinner, book a table for two at Arancino’s and savor the elegant flavors of Italy over a
bottle of wine.
Please ensure Javascript is enabled for purposes of
website accessibility

Delicious Menus
Explore our diverse menus at Kapahulu and Koko Marina locations. From fresh seafood to savory steaks, we offer a wide selection of dishes to satisfy your cravings.
Catering Services
Let us cater your next event with our delectable dishes. Whether it's a corporate luncheon or a special celebration, our catering services will impress your guests.
Private Events
Host your private events at HanaPa’a Market for an unforgettable experience. Our team will work with you to create a customized menu and ambiance for your special occasion.
Cooking Classes

HANAPA'A SIGNATURES
Ahi Fever Bowl
Local Island prepared 3 ways.
Furikake seared with wasabi aioli spicy ahi poke
Ahi fishcake topped with kabayaki
Choice of Rice, Takuan & Kim Chee
The Cali-Crunch
Salmon, imitation crab, tobiko, cucumber, avocado miser in spicy mayo. Choice of rice. Topped with tempura puffs, bubu rare, garlic chips & furikake.
Shoyu Ahi Nato
Shoyu Ahi, mixed in natto bean over your choice of rice and a side of pickled ginger.
Garlic Chili Tofu Bowl
Poke Bento
2 choice of ahi poke, kalua pig, imitation crab salad,choice of rice, and pickled veggies.
Kalua Pig Bowl
Slow cooked pork ,tomato poke, choice of rice.
SPECIALS
Garlic Tofu
Half(1/2) a block of sliced tofu covered in a garlic sauce with spicy garlic chili crisps.
Tako Luau
Braised octopus stewed in luau leafs with tomato poke.
Ahi Patties
Three tuna fish patties topped with kabayaki,  your choice of rice. Comes with  potato salad,  tossed greens,and kim-chee, tartar sauce.
Pastele Stew
Frozen Quart Size
Portugese Bean Soup
Frozen Quart Size / Bowls (when available)
Shoyu Pork Belly
PLATE LUNCHES
RICE CHOICE: white, brown or sushi rice.
Sides include: potato salad, and greens.
Blackened Ahi
Flash seared Ahi Tuna, coated with a tangy blackening season. 

All plates served with choice of rice, pickled ginger, green salad, potato salad and a wasabi aioli dipping sauce.
Seared Furikake Ahi
Ahi tuna coated in furikake, flash seared and sliced. side of wasabi aioli. 

Served on a bed of rice with potato and tossed green salad.
Misoyaki Salmon
Misoyaki steaks glazed and marinated in house made miso sauce. 

Potato salad, green salad and your choice of white, brown or sushi rice included.
Miso Mushroom
Two(2) Portobello mushrooms baked in our miso sauce, topped with sesame seeds and green onions. 

All plates served with choice of rice, pickled ginger, green salad and potato salad.
Teriyaki Chicken
Half a pound of chicken thigh marinated and baked in teriyaki sauce, finished with green onions and sesame seeds. 

All plates served with choice of rice, pickled ginger, green salad and potato salad.
Garlic Crusted Ahi (Tuna)
Two(2) Ahi Tuna steaks coated in a panko parmesan garlic crust, baked and served warm. 

All plates served with choice of rice, pickled ginger, green salad and potato salad.
Poke Plate Lunch
Your poke bowl upgraded with potato salad and tossed salad.
SANDWHICHES & SALADS
Original Spicy Ahi Poke
This original sandwich has our spicy Ahi mayo poke spread on a taro bun. Toppings include, lettuce, tomatoes pickles, avocado and clover sprouts. 

Combo includes chips, potato salad, and a green salad.
Garlic Butter Blackened Ahi
An Ahi Tuna Steak seasoned in blackening spice, topped with a garlic butter sauce, baked and placed on a taro bun with pickles, tomato, lettuce avocado and a tangy mayo. 

Combo includes chips, and a green salad.
Smoked Ahi
House made smoked ahi on a taro bun with lettuce, pickles, avocado, tomato, clover sprouts and mayo.

All sandwiches come with Chips & Tossed Salad
Miso Portobello
This vegan friendly sandwich has a portobello mushroom baked in our miso sauce on a taro bun. Fixings include, lettuce, tomatoes, and clover sprouts, avocado.

Combo includes chips, potato salad, and a green salad

All sandwiches come with Chips & Tossed Salad
Hanapa'a Salad
Our refreshing salad has Romaine lettuce, bean sprouts, shredded carrots, cucumbers, tomato, pineapple and crispy won-ton,  with a creamy miso sesame dressing.
Caesar salad
A traditional salad tossed in caesar dressing with tomatoes, crunchy croutons, parmesan cheese, and a cheesy garlic roll.

Kids Ahi

PLATES:
Kanaka Nui - Laulau, Kalua Pig, Chicken Long Rice, with choice of Beef Luau OR Squid Luau and choice of Rice OR Poi. Includes Lomi Salmon and Haupia. AKA The Works!
$28.50
Combo Plate - Pick 2 Entrees below

Chicken Long Rice
Kalua Pig
Laulau
Squid Luau
Combo plates come with choice of Rice or Poi. Combo Plate also includes Lomi Salmon and Haupia.

Chicken Long Rice
Kalua Pig
Laulau

Single plates come with choice of Rice or Poi. Plate also includes Lomi Salmon and Haupia.
$16.00
Bowl - Pick 1 Entree below
Beef Luau
Chicken Long Rice
Kalua Pig
Squid Luau
Bowl comes with RICE ONLY.
$11.25
SIDES:
Beef Luâau
- A savory Hawaiian stew made with braised beef chuck, sautÃ©ed onions, ginger and taro leaves that have been slow cooked until tender and packed with umami flavor.
$11.25
Kalua Pig
- Pork butt slow cooked and smoked for twelve hours achieving a fall off the bone tenderness that is then shredded and seasoned with Hawaiian sea salt. A dish that no Hawaiian menu would be complete without.
$11.25
Squid Luâau
- Thinly sliced octopus made tender in a rich and creamy coconut milk combined with slowly cooked taro leaves and seasoned with Hawaiian sea salt. A local favorite looked forward to at every Hawaiian gathering.
$11.25
Chicken Long Rice
- A delicious chicken and rice noodle dish served in a ginger and chicken broth. A simple, elegant dish and a perfect alternative to our beef and pork selections.
$10.00
Laulau
- A traditional Hawaiian dish consisting of a generous amount of pork and a touch of butter fish that is wrapped and steamed in taro leaves. A rich and flavorful medley of greens and protein.
$8.50
Hoâio Salad
- A refreshing fern salad with julienne onions and diced tomatoes garnished with dried shrimp and served with a sweet soy and ginger sauce. The perfect item for a vegan diet, just ask to hold the shrimp.
$5.75
Lomi Salmon
- A traditional Hawaiian side dish of diced tomatoes, onion, green onion and salt cured salmon that no Hawaiian plate would be complete without.
$5.75
Haupia
- Haupia is a light and fluffy coconut dessert with a consistency similar to custard. A true classic served on many Hawaiian menus.
$4.25
Poi
- Poi is a starch derived from the taro root and has been the staple of the Hawaiian diet since the beginning. The taro root is steamed and either milled, or pounded and mixed with water to a smooth consistency and pairs well with any Hawaiian dish.
$3.25
Rice
- Short grain white rice has also become a staple of the Hawaiian diet since its arrival from Asia many years ago. Contemporarily white rice has been served along side many local and Hawaiian favorites.
$3.00
DRINKS @ ORIGINAL LOCATION:
Limeaide
- Our limeade is the perfect drink to beat the heat and is made in house with fresh squeezed lime juice.
$4.00
Mamaki tea
- Mamaki is a red Hawaiian tea that is brewed fresh in house with Mamaki leaves and lemon grass that can be ordered both sweetened or unsweetened. The perfect drink to accompany a Hawaiian meal.
Â $4.00
Awa
- Awa is a very traditional and both ceremonial and social drink that can have a relaxing effect when consumed.
$4.00
Coke, Diet Coke, Sprite, Hawaiian Sun Juices , Water
$2.00
DESSERTS:
Sweet Lady of Waiahole
- The Sweet Lady of Waiahole is our signature dessert that is sure to please any pallete. It consists of our warm, house made kulolo topped with a creamy and delicious Haupia flavored ice cream.Â Â
Tahitian Sweet Lady
- Warm Banana Po'e and Haupia Ice Cream
Both above:
1 scoop ice cream
$8.00 single
2 scoops ice cream

We hope that you and your ohana are safe and healthy. We moved to our new home at 1020 Keolu Drive, suite D1 in Kailua, better known as Enchanted lake shopping center.

Drinks
Cocktails
Azure Mai Tai
-
$ 25
An ode to the classic Vic’s 44 Mai Tai, featuring local Ko Hana Kea Agricole rhum, fresh lime, orgeat, orange liqueur, and topped with El Dorado 15yr aged rum
Puka Pineapple Martini
In honor of the small shells found along the beach that have become a staple in Hawaiian fashion, we offer our martini that will allow you to reminisce on all your beach day memories. This martini is prepared with vodka, pineapple juice, coconut cream, and fresh lime juice
Pele Pina
-
$ 22
This cocktail honors the goddess Pele and allows us to recognize all the beauty that surrounds us thanks to her creation. Created with local Kohana rum, pineapple juice, strawberry puree, lime juice and grenadine
Waimanalo Blues
-
$ 23
A beverage that praises the wonderous ocean colors that surround us. This cocktail is made up of empress gin, pink lemonade, blue curacao and crème de violette.
Makai Mango Margarita
-
$ 22
Makai in Hawaiian culture stands for the direction that is towards the ocean. In enjoying this cocktail we hope to bring that refreshing feeling one gets from being near the ocean. This cocktail is made of tequila, contreau, lime juice and mango puree
Mariposa
-
$ 24
The SS Mariposa was Matson’s second luxury liner and part of their signature, “White Fleet” - she voyaged throughout the Pacific and Tasman Sea. To celebrate these journeys, we’ve combined El Tequileno Reposado tequila, Kohana Koho Agricole rhum, macnut orgeat, poblano liqueur, and fresh local juices to harken back those luxurious and exotic Pan-Pacific days
Tutu's Lullaby
-
$ 21
In honor of Mary Robin’s song, “Royal Hawaiian Hotel” which was played late into the evening on opening night, February 1, 1927 — this elegant yet boozy concoction will ease the mind with tropical call backs to one of the grandest soirees the Pacific has known. Prepared with local Pau Maui vodka, Aperol, chamomile syrup, lemon juice, and finished with club soda
Lurline Lemonade
-
$ 19
The final luxury liner built by Matson, christened SS Lurline, in 1932, Lurline was used for express passage from San Francisco to Honolulu. The cool and breezy Lurline Lemonade is reminiscent of days at sea and nights on the promenade. Made tall with Fid Street gin, dried lavender, lemon, and club soda
6 O'Clock Special
-
$ 21
Every evening at 6pm, The Royal Hawaiian bell tower chimes to signify dining hour has begun. This evening, treat yourself to an espresso martini to get the festivities started — Absolut vodka, Kahlua, local espresso, served chilled and up
